Tiene variadas clases de ellos y comenta que es muy gustado por sus clientes, lo que le ayuda mucho, pues tiene buena venta. Comenta que al principio le fue un poco difícil, pero que ahora ya tiene buena clientela.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de perlas, lentejuelas, hilos, y demás insumos necesarios para seguir haciendo los Bijouteries que vende.
texts.en:
The Santa Lucía communal bank is in its 15th cycle of the Enterprising Women's Program of the Fundación Paraguaya.  It has 17 members and is in the Asunción area.  All of the members carry out productive activities.  They also carry out activities that strengthen their camaraderie.  

Lourdes is a very hard-working and creative woman.  This can be seen in the beautiful costume jewelry that she makes.  She has various kinds of jewelry, and she says that her customers really like the jewelry.  This helps her a lot because she has good sales.  She says that in the beginning it was a little difficult for her, but now she has a good clientele.

She is requesting the loan to buy pearls, sequins, thread, and other needed supplies to continue making the costume jewelry that she sells.

loans.use: to buy pearls, sequins, thread, and other supplies.

loans.name: Virgen  De Fátima Group

texts.es:
El comité inicio gracias a  la señora Irene, quien contacto con sus vecinas y amigas para formar el comité en la zona. El comité se denomina “Virgen de Fátima”, está constituido  por  15  señoras muy activas y solidarias todas de la misma zona. Ellas hacen cada una, actividades independientes, pero también hacen actividades para ayudarse como grupo.
Gladys es muy sacrificada, ella nos cuenta que todos los días trabaja desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana, arreglando y a veces atendiendo ya su despensa. Tiene un negocio bien surtido con todo tipo de artículos de primera necesidad. Su meta es poder ampliar su despensa, y algún día poder tener un mini super.
Ella solicita la ayuda de fundación paraguaya y kiva para poder abastecer su negocio con productos de primera necesidad, como ser azúcar, fideos, arroz, y demás. Agradecen todas ellas por la oportunidad que les dan
texts.en:
This group was started thanks to Señora Irene, who reached out to her neighbors and friends to start a group in her area.  The group is called “Virgen de Fátima”, and is made up of 15 very active and supportive women, all from the same area.  Each one works independently but they also do activities to help themselves as a group.

Gladys is very self-sacrificing.  She tells us that everyday she works from very early in the morning getting her small store ready and sometimes serving there.  She has a well-stocked business with all types of every-day necessities.  Her goal is to be able to expand her store, and some day to be able to have a mini-supermarket.

She is requesting the help of Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva so as to be able to stock up her business with everyday items such as sugar, noodles, rice and additional things.  

All the members are grateful for the opportunity that is being given to them.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, noodles, rice and other items.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 26 years old and single. He is a small-scale farmer in Kapsabet and has been in operation for a period of one year, earning a monthly income of KES 2,000.

His loan of KES 20,000 from KADET LTD is his first term loan and he wishes to use this amount to purchase seeds in preparation for the planting season. The ploughed amount will be used to expand the farm for tilling.

He hopes to own a big farm and also a family.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Saltanat

texts.ru: Салтанат 46 лет, замужем, воспитывает троих детей. В 2006 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Салтанат начала свой бизнес в торговле канцелярскими  и хозяйственными товарами, использовав 10,000 сом (KGS) в качестве стартового капитала.  Практикуя выездную торговлю на рынке, Салтанат и ее муж приложили все усилия для развития бизнеса и добились успехов – на сегодня в товарообороте находится около 50,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день, ассортимент товаров не представлен в изобилии, поэтому Салтанат обратилась в компанию «Бай  Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS). Закуп товаров позволит ей расширить ассортимент, увеличить количество клиентов и повысить продажи.  Доходы Салтанат планирует вложить в покупку машину, чтобы иметь возможность реализовывать свой товар в отдаленных селах.
texts.en: Saltanat is 46 years old, married and is raising three children.  In 2006, in search of an income source for her family, she started her own business of selling office and household goods, using a sum of 10,000 som (KGS) as an initial capital.  Traveling to a market to sell their merchandise, Saltanat and her husband put forth all their efforts to develop this business and achieved success.  Today, they have a goods turnover of about 50,000 som (KGS).  Currently, the goods selection is limited, and this is why Saltanat requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company.  Purchasing merchandise will allow her to expand the goods selection, increase the number of customers and increase sales.  Saltanat plans to invest the profits into purchasing a car in order to have an ability to sell her merchandise in remote villages.

loans.use: to broaden an assortment of goods

loans.name: Muyassar

texts.ru: Муяссар занимается торговлей на рынке. Она имеет торговую точку, где продает продукты и хозяйственные товары. Ей 48 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж и сын находятся в Российской Федерации. Она берет кредит для покупки шоколада и конфет.
texts.en: Muyassar is involved in sales at a market.  She has a retail outlet, where she sells products and household goods.  She is 48 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband and son are in the Russian Federation.  Muyassar is requesting this loan to purchase chocolate and candy.

loans.use: to purchase chocolate and candy

loans.name: Hakimkhon

texts.ru: Хакимхон проживает в городе Вахдат. Ему 54 года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Он более пяти лет занимается скотоводством. Кроме того в свободное время Хакимхон работает строительными работами по найму. Он берет крелит для закупа бычков с целью увеличения количества скота.
texts.en: Hakimkhon lives in Vahdat. He is 54 years old, married and has five children. For the last five years he has been raising cattle for sale. During his free time Hakimkhon also works as a construction worker. He is taking out this loan in order to purchase additional calves for his herd.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise including children’s and baby clothes, bath towels, hats, underwear, and blouses.

loans.name: Everlyne

texts.en: Everlyne is a 27-year-old single woman. She describes herself to be determined. She operates a food retail business where she sells fish. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a fast growing area and her primary customers are residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds to improve the retail store. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more fish. Everlyne's business goal is to expand her business and have employees within five years.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Mumaram

texts.ru:
Мумарам  49 лет, воспитала двоих детей. В 2009 году Мумарам начала свой бизнес в торговле продуктами питания.  Стартовав с суммой в 40,000 сом (KGS), и взяв в аренду магазин,  Мумарам сумела развить свой бизнес с ежемесячным доходом в сумме 20,000 сом.   
В целях расширения ассортимента товаров, Мумарам обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS).  Мумарам мечтает открыть свой собственный магазин с продуктами.
texts.en: Mumaram is 49 years old and has raised two children. In 2009 she opened a grocery store using a starting capital of 40,000 som (KGS). Currently Mumaram rents a store space and her grocery business has a monthly profit of 20,000 som (KGS). In order to expand her inventory and offer her clients more choices, Mumaram has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS). In the future Mumaram dreams to own the store space she is currently renting.

loans.use: to expand the assortment of goods

loans.name: Abdusator

texts.ru: Абдусатор проживает в городе Вахдат. Он женат. Ему 46 лет. У него трое детей. Он имеет средне - специальное образование, строитель. По специальности он работает 10 лет. Кроме того он занимается животноводством. Он закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа несколько голов крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Abdusator lives in Vahdat. He is 46 years old, married and has three children. Abdusator has a professional degree as a construction worker and has been working in this field for more then 10 years. He also has a cattle business where he raises meat cattle for future resale at the market. Abdusator is taking out this loan to buy a few more calves for his herd.

loans.use: to purchase a few heads of cattle

loans.name: Elena

texts.ru: Елена жительница района Яван. Ей 39 лет. Она разведена. У нее двое детей. Ее дети учатся в средней школе. Уже три года как она открыла дилерский центр, где пополняет баланс мобильных телефонов и продает диски. Она берет кредит для приобретения сим - карт.
texts.en: Elena is a resident of Yavan region. She is 39 years old, divorced and is raising two children. Her kids still attend school. For the last three years she has been managing a mobile phone booth where customers can refill the balances on their prepaid mobile phones as well as purchase CDs and DVDs. Elena is taking out this loan to purchase a batch of sim cards for mobile phones.

loans.use: to purchase sim cards

loans.name: Nasim

texts.ru: Насим проживает в городе Истаравшан. Ему 72 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Насим имеет среднее образование. Он занимается растениеводством. В основном он выращивает картошку для продажи. Кредит берет закупа семян картошки и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Nasim lives in the city of Istaravshan.  He is 72 years old, married and has two children.  Nasim has a secondary education.  He is involved in agriculture.  He primarily grows potatoes for sale.  Nasim is requesting this loan to purchase potato seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Shamsiddin

texts.ru: Шамсиддин житель района Рудаки. Ему 29 лет. Он женат. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается торговлей. У него имеется магазин, где он продает продукты питания. В этой области Шамсиддин восемь лет. Он берет кредит для покупки кондитерских изделий, вафель и конфет.
texts.en: Shamsiddin is a resident of the region Rudaki. He is 29 years old and married. His wife is a house wife. He works in retail. He owns a store, where he sells food. Shamsiddin has worked in this area for eight years. He takes a loan for the purchase of confectionery, wafers and candy.

loans.use: to purchase confectionary, wafers and candy

loans.name: Terry

texts.en:
Terry is 32 years old and the mother of one child who is 10 years old. She sells different items like instant shower and fridge guard. She has been in the business for the past seven years. She gets a monthly income of KES 95,000 from her business.

This is her first loan from KADET LTD. She will use the loan to diversify the business by purchasing cosmetics to sell. She was introduced to KADET LTD by a KADET staff member. Her dream is to own a shopping mall in the next year.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Martin

texts.en:
Martin is a married man. He has two children aged 10 and 15. He describes himself to be determined, innovative, and kind. 

Martin operates a retail store where he sells items such as tissue paper, sugar, salt, rice, soap, etc. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a highly populated area and his primary customers are residents. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to purchase more home products such as bread, flour, sugar, etc. to sell. Martin's business goal is to run a big supermarket within five years.

loans.use: to purchase more home products such as bread, flour, sugar, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Ilyos

texts.ru: Илёс житель города Истаравшан. Ему 28 лет. Он женат. У него семеро детей. Он живет вместе с родителями. Илёс имеет среднее образование. Он занимается торговлей женской одежды. Этим видом бизнеса занимается пять лет. Кредит берет для покупки зимней женской одежды и обуви.
texts.en: Ilyos is a resident of Istravshan. He is 28 years old, married and has seven children. His family still lives with his parents. Ilyos has a high school degree and sells women's clothing from a stall at the market. He has been making a living in retail for the last five years. Ilyos is taking out this loan to purchase women's clothes and shoes for the winter season.

loans.use: to purchase winter clothes and shoes for women

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru:
Баходур житель города Истаравшан. Ему 34 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается скотоводством. Он у себя дома разводит крупнорогатый скот. В этой области он уже восемь лет. Кредит
берет для закупа двух телят.
texts.en: Bahodur lives in Istaravshan. He is 34 years old, married and has three children. His wife is a home maker and Bahodur supports the family by raising cattle. He raises calves at home for resale at the markets. Bahodur has eight years experience with this type of business. He is taking out this loan to purchase two more calves for his herd.

loans.use: to purchase two calves

loans.name: Tulkin

texts.ru: Тулкин более 12 лет занимается животноводством. Ему 40 лет. Он имеет высшее педагогическое образование. По профессии он работает 15 лет. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Тулкин берет кредит для закупа телят с целью увеличения количества скота.
texts.en:
Tulkin has been raising cattle for more then twelve years. He is a forty year old man and has earned a college degree in education. Tulkin has been working as an educator for the last 15 years and uses the cattle sales to supplement his income. Tulkin is married and is raising six children. He is taking out this loan to purchase additional calves for his herd.
|

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Salima

texts.en: Salima is 40 years old. She is married and has three children. She is engaged in an agriculture business to support her family. Salima has been selling milk and animals for 15 years and her frequent clients are butchers. She also sells chicken, eggs, and vegetables from her farm. She wants to obtain the loan of AZN 500 to buy a ram. She is planning to expand her business in the future, as she wants to give her children a good life. Salima hopes that you will help her to achieve her goals.

loans.use: To buy a ram.

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en:
Hamisi is a 40-year-old married man. His wife is a businesswoman who contributes to the provision of the family's basic needs. He owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for his family. 

Hamisi has operated a fruit and vegetable stall for the past four years; his potential clients are the local area residents. He faces a major challenge of seasonality. He dreams of expanding his business.

With the KES 30,000 he wants to purchase more stock of oranges, mangoes, tomatoes, onions, bananas, and carrots for resale. He decided to join Yehu to access funds to expand his business.

loans.use: To purchase more stock of oranges, mangoes, tomatoes, onions, bananas, and carrots for resale.

loans.name: Kulbayra

texts.ru:
Кулбайре 47 лет, замужем, воспитывает четырех детей.  Кулбайра работает бухгалтером в местной Ассоциации водопользователей и в качестве дополнительного заработка, занимается животноводством. Начав этот бизнес после развала Советского Союза с суммы 100 советских рублей , Кулбайра смогла развить хозяйство, насчитывающее 4 коровы, 5 баранов. Продажа молока и молочных продуктов позволяет Кулбайре зарабатывать  около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кулбайра обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 45,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы . Доходы Кулбайра планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота,  а в ближайшем будущем – посадить фасоль и картофель .
texts.en:
Kulbayra is 47 years old, married and is raising four children. She works as an accountant in the local water users association and raises livestock to supplement her salary. Kulbayra started this business using 100 soviet rubels shortly after the fall of the Soviet Union. Since then, Kulbayra's herd has expanded and now has four milk cows and five sheep and the dairy sales result in a monthly profit of 15,000 som (KGS).

In order to purchase another dairy cow, Kulbayra has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 45,000 som (KGS). She is planning to use the profits from additional dairy sales to buy even more animals as well as start planting beans and potatoes for sale.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Bozorboy

texts.ru: Бозорбой житель Яванского района. Ему 41 год. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Он занимается животноводством. В основном он откармливает и продает скот. Эти видом деятельности занимается 15 лет. Бозорбой первый раз берет кредит в нашей организации с целью закупа несколько голов крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Bozorboy lives in Yavan region. He is 41 years old, married and has six children. For the last fifteen years Bozorboy has been raising cattle, mostly meat cattle for fattening and resale. This is the first time that Bozorboy has turned to Kiva for a loan, which he plans to use to purchase a few more calves for his business.

loans.use: to purchase a few heads of cattle

loans.name: Asilkhan

texts.ru: Асилхан 59 лет. В 2000 году, в поисках источника финансирования своей семьи, Асилхан начала свой бизнес в разведении скота .Использовав стартовую сумму в 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, Асилхан сумела развить свое хозяйство, с ежемесячной прибылью в сумме около 2,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Асилхан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме  120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы  и баранов для откорма и перепродажи. В ближайшее время, при помощи доходов от кредита, Асилхан планирует увеличивать поголовье  скота.
texts.en: Asilkhan is 59 years old. She has started her livestock business back in 2000, using 30,000 som (KGS) to purchase a few animals. Since then Asilkhan's herd grew and the profits from this business are about 2,000 som (KGS) monthly. In order to buy more cows and sheep for her herd, Asilkhan has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS). In the future, using the profits from this loan Asilkhan wants to continue expanding her herd.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Sharaf

texts.ru: Шараф проживает в Гиссарском районе. Ему 25 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Он занимается торговлей панелей телефонов. Этим видом деятельности он занимается шесть лет. Кредит берет для покупки мобильных телефонов и их запасных частей.
texts.en:
Sharaf lives in the Gissar region. He is 25 years old and married. He has three children. He works with selling mobile phone covers. He has been engaged in this activity for six years. 

He takes the loan for the purchase of mobile phones and spare parts for them.

loans.use: to purchase mobile phones and spare parts

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna, a 39-year-old mother of two children aged 16 years and 14 years, has had a motorcycle business known locally as boda boda for one year, and estimates her monthly income to be Kshs. 9,000. 

Anna has requested a loan of Kshs. 25,000 to diversify into both the cereal business and farming. She will use the money to buy bags of maize for sale and a cow to rear for milk production. The anticipated profit will help Anna uplift her family’s status, and her dream is to be successful and buy her own plot of land.

loans.use: to diversify into dairy farming.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité se Denomina “Mujeres Unidas“, debido a la unión que tienen las miembros y la solidaridad, las unas con las otras. Están iniciando el Quinto Ciclo  con 26  integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca  en el barrio por ser muy unidas, solidarias  y responsable entre ellas, todas ellas con diferentes actividades, las mismas poseen un gran espíritu emprendedor, ya que realizan labores para recaudar fondos para la comunidad.
 Silveria nos cuenta que le va muy bien en su micro negocio de perfumes, ya que siempre tiene muy buena variedad de perfumes, tanto para hombres como para mujeres, lo que le hace atraer muy buena clientela. Ella se define como una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, que se esfuerza por su familia y por los suyos, pues quiere darles lo mejor siempre.
En vista a seguir creciendo es que ella solicita el crédito, ya que desea poder tener más variedad de perfumes para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Unidas” (United Women) communal bank was named for the union that the members have and for the way they support each other.  They are starting their fifth cycle with 26 members.  It is a group that stands out in the neighborhood for being very united, supportive, and responsible for each other.  All of them have different business activities.  They have a great enterprising spirit; they do work to raise funds for the community.

Silveria tells us that her small perfume business is going very well for her.  She always has a very good variety of perfume, as much for men as for women.  This attracts a very good clientele.  She is known as a very hard-working and tenacious woman.  She puts forth great effort for her family and loved ones; she wants to always give them the best.

With the vision of continuing to grow she is requesting the loan.  She wishes to be able to have a greater variety of perfumes to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy perfumes to sell.

loans.name: Oretha

texts.en:
Oretha is 48 years old and lives in Gardnersville. She’s divorced, and has three children between 12 and 27 who live at home and attend school.

Oretha has been selling rice, oil and pepper for the past nine years,  She was taught how to run the business by her mother-in-law.  Her main challenge is the high cost of goods.  She is happy when she makes more profit; it enables her to help her children and pay their school fees.  She’s requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil and pepper for her business. She would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil and pepper for her business.

loans.name: Mardaly

texts.es:
Mardaly tiene 41 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos con las edades de 12, 11,6 y 1 años y vive con su familia en la aldea la Lechuga de choloma, cortes.
Mardaly con visión de generar mas ingresos, decidió  hace 9 años establecer un negocio de sastrería, en el cual confecciona ropa para damas, aparte de la confección ella también se dedica a la venta de lociones, zapatos de mujer y novedades, dedica todo el día a su negocio y al mismo tiempo desempeña el trabajo de ama de casa.
Ella ha solicitado un préstamo  de 4, 000 lempiras para poder surtir su negocio en compra de  telas, hilos etc., y suplir también de mercadería,  en la cual espera crecer más en clientes y obtener mejores ingresos para el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Mardaly, age 41, is married and has four children, ages 12, 11, 6, and 1.  She lives with her family in the La Lechuga de Choloma village in Cortes.

Mardaly envisioned generating more income, so nine years ago she decided to establish a tailoring business.  She makes women’s clothes.  She also sells lotions, women’s clothes, and novelties. She devotes all day to her business, and at the same time she does the work of a housewife.

She has requested a loan for 4,000 lempiras in order to be able to stock her business with fabric and thread, etc.  She will also stock up on merchandise.  She hopes to get more customers and to get better income to support her family.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread, etc. and merchandise like lotions, shoes, and other items.

loans.name: Jose Javier

texts.es: José Javier tiene 41 años de edad, el trabaja en una empresa de la comunidad su cargo es supervisor de seguridad, el tiene 1 hija que todavía está a su cargo y está estudiando en secundaria. La mayor inspiración de José es de terminar de construir su vivienda y brindarle a su familia una mejor comodidad. José Javier está solicitando financiamiento para construir las paredes y el techo de la vivienda lo cual comprara materiales de construcción para realizarles las mejoras.
texts.en: José Javier is 41 years old. He works at a local business. He is security supervisor. José Javier has one daughter that he still supports. She is in secondary school. Jose’s biggest inspiration is to finishing building his him and to give his family more comfort. José Javier is requesting a loan to build the walls and roof of the home. He will buy the construction materials needed for making the improvements.

loans.use: purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is a 50 year old business lady.  She is a single mother of two children. She has been selling cereals for the past six years, earning a monthly income of KES 20,000, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her first term loan from KADET, LTD. after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Catherine will use the loan to buy dry maize and beans for her business. 

With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and to build a store for her grains.

loans.use: to buy dry maize and beans for her business.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy, 33, is married to Justus, a businessman, and they are blessed with one child aged seven years. The operator of a salon for the past five years, Mercy earns a monthly income of KES 5,000 which she uses to support her family.

Now applying for a loan from KADET LTD to buy a blow dryer and a hair dryer, Mercy will use the anticipated additional profit to educate her children. Her dream is to add cosmetics to her shop.

loans.use: to buy a blow dryer and a hair dryer.

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en:
Dorcas is 50 years old, is from Nakuru and is married with four children aged between 15 years and 32 years.

Dorcas has a clothing business that she has been running for the past six years. She has applied for a loan from KADET, LTD. to enable her buy more clothes to add to her stock.

She hopes to open up a boutique in the near future.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to add to her stock.

loans.name: Riva

texts.en:
Riva is applying for a new loan to start a new clothing sales business. He will use this 50,000 Kes loan to purchase stocks of clothes for resale. In the future, Riva aspires to continue improving his business.

Since taking his last Kiva loan, Riva has greatly improved his family’s standard of living. He hopes to continue accessing the financial services offered by Yehu and Kiva lenders, and thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase stocks of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Rita Ana

texts.es:
Doña Rita, sigue con su negocio  venta de fritanga, el cual hace dia a dia, anteriormente vendia tortillas, pero ha obtenido mejores ganancia con la venta de comida, lo que espera seguir invirtiendo para obtener mejores beneficios para sus hijos, ya que no tienen el apoyo economico de su papa ya que el fallecio hace años.
Con este nuevo prestamo, invertira en la compra de arroz, bidon de aceite, frutas, verduras, carne, pollo, aumentando la produccion, logrando vender mas. Como objetivo a futuro es tener un comedor fijo.
texts.en:
Rita continues with her business selling fritanga (fried snacks), which she does every day. Previously, she sold tortillas, but has earned more by selling food. 

She hopes to keep investing in her business, to get better profits for her children. They don't have financial support from their father, because he passed away years ago. 

With this new loan she will buy rice, a barrel of oil, fruits, vegetables, meat, and chicken. By increasing her production, she will be able to sell more. 

Her objective for the future is to have a permanent eatery.

loans.use: To buy staple grains, meat, chicken, vegetables, and fruits for making more food to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, sand, and other construction materials

loans.name: Yesenia Del Carmen

texts.es: Yesenia del Carmen tiene 30 años de edad, ella trabaja como obrera en la alcaldía de su comunidad, tiene 2 hijos en el cual están todavía a su cargo están estudiando. Su esposo la apoya en todas las decisiones que ella toma, su mayor sueño es de terminar de construir por completo su vivienda donde habita. Yesenia está solicitando financiamiento para construir el techo la vivienda, y otros materiales de construcción.
texts.en:
Yesenia del Carmen is 30, and works as a laborer for her local municipality. She has two children going to school, who are still her responsibility.

Her husband supports her in all the decisions that she takes. Her greatest dream is to completely finish building the house where she lives. Yesenia is applying for a loan to put a roof on her home, and to buy other construction materials.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.en:
Gabriel, 25, is married to Stella, and they are blessed with two children aged four and two years. He runs a cereals business that earns him a monthly income of KES 8,000.

Gabriel is now requesting a loan of KES 30,000 with which to purchase more cereal products. He will use the anticipated profit to repay the loan, and his dream is to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy more cereal products to boost his business.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a 49 year old business lady.  She is a single mother of two children aged 18 and five years respectively. She has been running a green grocer business for the past four years, earning a monthly income of KES 10,000, which she uses to support her family.


She is applying for her first loan from  KADET, LTD. after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Jane will use the loan to buy green vegetables and fruits for her business. 


With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her child. Her hopes and dreams are to open a retail shop and continue with the grocery business.

loans.use: to buy green vegetables and fruits for her business.

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en:
Jackson, a married 40-year-old father of 10-year-old twins, has been farming for 15 years and mainly produces maize for the local market. Jackson says the major problem in the area remains poor infrastructure which delays farmers' deliveries to the market and significantly affects their incomes. He earns additional money from his employment with Kenya Seen Company.

Jackson has requested a loan of 31,200 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. He says the acquisition of a dairy cow will provide the family with milk for daily consumption as well as help pay for the children's education. He aspires to own a pick-up truck in order to venture into the transport business.

loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es: Nilda tiene 43 años y está casada con Samuel. Ambos tienen 5 hijos, pero solo vive con 4 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay, distrito de Huasahuasi. Nilda es una mujer agricultora. Junto a su hijo Wilder, se dirigen todas las mañanas a sus cultivos de arveja, papa y maíz; donde trabajan arduamente desde al amanecer hasta el anochecer. Además se dedica al cuidado de sus animales, a los que cuida y engorda para su venta, como vacas, toros, cerdos y ovejas. Ya tiene 20 años dedicándose a ello, y afirma que a pesar de los inconvenientes que se suscitan constantemente, como en temporadas de lluvia, cuando aparece la enfermedad de “la rancha”. Ella a pesar de ello tiene mucha fe y ganas de trabajar, ya que el campo “es su vida”, ahí nació y creció.  Por ello más adelante desea construir una casa más segura donde pueda vivir, y poner un negocio propio. Como socia antigua de su banco comunal, se siente agradecida por todo el apoyo que recibe de parte de ellos y está segura podrá concluir con sus aspiraciones. Ahora quiere dedicarse de lleno a sus sembríos por que es el negocio que el da ingresos para sus gastos diarios. Éste sería su préstamo número 10 de MFP, por eso agradece su apoyo, por la oportunidad de desarrollo. Se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los Pioneros de Cumutay”, se siente contenta de pertenecerlo por los intereses comunes. Invertirá el dinero del préstamo en la compra de bolsas de semillas de arvejas para iniciar una siembra para el mes de mayo o junio.
texts.en:
Nilda is 43 and married to Samuel. They have five children, but only live with four of them in their own house, located in the settlement of Cumutay in Huasihuasi district. 

Nilda is a woman farmer. With her son Wilder, she heads to her pea, potato, and corn fields every morning, where she works hard from dawn to dusk. In addition, she looks after her animals, that she cares for and fattens for sale. These include cows, bulls, pigs and sheep. 

She has been doing this for 20 years already, and says that in spite of the problems that constantly arise, such as in the rainy seasons when the "la rancha" disease (potato blight) appears, she has a lot of faith, and the desire to work. The countryside is "her life"; she was born and raised there. 

That's why later on, she wishes to build a more secure house where she can live, and set up her own business.

As a longtime member of the communal bank, she feels grateful for all the support she receives from them, and she is sure she will be able to her fulfill her ambitions. Now she wants to devote herself fully to her planting, because this is the business that provides the income for her daily expenses. 

This would be her tenth loan with MFP, and she is grateful for their support, and for the opportunity for development. She promises to pay her intallments on time. She belongs to the "Los Pioneros de Cumutay" communal bank, and feels happy to be a part of it, because of their common interests. 

She will use the money to buy bags of pea seeds to begin planting by May or June.

loans.use: To buy bags of pea seeds.

loans.name: Graciela Yohanna

texts.es: Graciela Yohanna tiene 40 años edad en el cual su actividad económica a la que se dedica es a una pulpería, ella tiene 2 hijos en el cual no están a su cargo pero le ayudan económicamente. Este negocio lo emprende de la necesidad de generar ingresos a la familia, ella ya tienen experiencia en el negocio a su clientes le ofrece variedad de productos su mayores clientes son los que están cerca de la comunidad donde vive. Graciela está solicitando financiamiento para comprar productos para la pulpería.
texts.en: Graciela Yohanna, 40, has a grocery story.  She has 2 children who are not in her care, but whom she helps financially.  She started this business because she needed to generate income for her family.  It is a business in which she already has experience.  She offers a variety of products to her customers, most of whom are from the community where she lives.  Graciela is requesting a loan to buy products for her grocery store.

loans.use: to buy products for her grocery store

loans.name: Isaac

texts.en:
Isaac is 40 years old and married to Veronica, who is a farmer.  They are blessed with ten children.  He is a charcoal dealer, and he has been in this business for five years.  Right now his monthly income is KES 8,000.

He is  borrowing KES 20,000, with which he intends to purchase more sacks of charcoal to boost the business. He will use the anticipated profits to support his family. 

This is his first loan.  His hope and dream for the future is to see that his family is stable.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal that would boost his busines.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.ru: Ахмад житель района Дангары. Ему 34 года. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Его дети учатся в средней школе. Сам он занимается скотоводством. Он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 20 лет. Кредит берет для закупа несколько голов крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en:
Ahmad is a resident of the region Dangara. He is 34 years old and married. He has four children. His children are in high school. He works with animal husbandry. He makes an income by breeding cattle. He has been engaged in this activity for 20 years. 

Ahmad takes a loan for the purchase of cattle.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Marion

texts.en:
Marion is a 44 year old beauty salon owner in Miritini, Mombasa. She is married, and her business has been in operation for the last seven years with great success.

This marks her third business loan from KADET, LTD. to finance her business. She plans to purchase new hair driers, blow driers and hair curling tongs. 

She will use the anticipated profits to open another salon. She hopes to excel in the business.

loans.use: to purchase new hair driers, blow driers and hair curling tongs.

loans.name: Idimo

texts.ru: Идимо более 10 лет занимается торговлей. Она имеет торговую точку на рынке, где продает детскую и женскую одежду. Кроме того она занимается торговлей детской обуви. Кредит берет для покупки парфюмерии и зимней детской обуви.
texts.en:
Idimo has worked with trade for more than 10 years. She owns an outlet at the market, where she sells children's and women's clothing. In addition, she also works with selling children's shoes. 

Idimo takes the loan for the purchase of perfumes and children's winter shoes.

loans.use: to purchase perfume and children's winter clothing

loans.name: Elkin

texts.es: El señor Elkin a sus 29 años de edad es padre de dos hijos de 12 y 7 años, se dedica junto con su esposa desde hace tres años a la producción y venta de arepas principalmente a los restaurantes ubicados en la Autopista Medellín-Bogotá. Con la esperanza de mejorar sus ventas y con estas su calidad de vida, el señor Elkin necesita de la compra de materia prima como maíz y carbón y hacerle adecuaciones locativas a su pequeña fábrica puesto que cuando llueve le ingresa agua deteriorando así su maquinaria. El sueño del señor Elkin es poder producir grandes lotes de arepas y tener más clientes.
texts.en:
Elkin is 29 years old and the father of two children who are 12 and 7 years old. He has made a living with his wife for three years making and selling arepas [stuffed corn patties] mainly to restaurants located on the Medellín-Bogotá highway.

With the hope of improving his sales and his quality of life, Elkin needs to buy basic materials like corn and charcoal. He also need to make improvements to his small shop. When it rains, water enters damaging his machinery.

Elkin's dream is to be able to produce large quantities of arepas and have more customers.

loans.use: to buy supplies like corn and charcoal as well as improvements to the floor and walls of the shop.

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward is a 40-year-old married man with six children, who are all enrolled in school. His wife is a businesswoman, who contributes to providing the family's basic needs. Edward lives in a rental house with electricity but no piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food for his family and school fees for his children. 

Edward has operated as a carpenter for the past 20 years.  His potential clients are the local area residents. He faces a major challenge of seasonality. He dreams of expanding his business.

With the KES 30,000 he wants to purchase more timber and working tools like clamps, such as C-clamps and G-clamps, and a jack plane for his business. He decided to join Yehu to access capital to expand his business.

loans.use:
to purchase more timber and working tools like clamps, such as 
C-clamps and G clamps, and a jack plane for his business.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
La Señora Rosa es socia del banco comunal Feria Libre, vive por un hermoso sector de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que desde diciembre de 1999 es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, esta bañada por 4 ríos, cuenta con variada gastronomía. Su gente es amable, gentil, trabajadora y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de su gente.

Doña Rosa tiene 64 años, está separada de su marido y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 10 hijos todos mayores de edad, cinco son casados y viven independientes, tres son solteros, trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, y dos de sus hijos estudian en una universidad de la ciudad. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.
 
La Señora Rosa se dedica a la venta de verduras las que compra para revender o las vende de sus cultivos, lleva varios años en este trabajo, también cría pollos, cerdos y cuyes a los que los vende cuando tiene alguna necesidad económica.

En el banco comunal se encuentra hace 13 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en pagar los estudios Universitarios de sus hijos.
 
Su meta es comprarse un vehículo con su hija.
texts.en:
Señora Rosa is a member of the communal bank Feria Libre. She lives in a beautiful sector of the city of Cuenca, a city that was named a UNESCO World Heritage site in December 1999. It is bathed by four rivers and has a varied gastronomy. Its people are kind, gentle, and hard-working, and they maintain their traditions and culture.

Doña Rosa is 64 years old. She is separated from her husband and has 10 adult children. Five are married and live independently; three are single, they work and help her financially; and two are studying at the university in the city. The house in which she lives is her own.

Señora Rosa sells vegetables that she buys for resale or that come from her fields. She has done this work for a number of years. She also raises chickens, pigs, and guinea pigs, which she sells when she has a financial need.

She has been a member of her communal bank for 13 years, and she will invest her new loan in paying for the university studies of her children.
 
Her goal is to buy a car with her daughter.

loans.use: to pay for university studies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice and palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Aminata D.

texts.en:
Presented to you in the photo is Aminata, a secondary school teacher in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone. Aminata has been a professional teacher for 22 years now. A native of Portloko town in northern Sierra Leone, Aminata is aged 47. She is married to a nurse and the couple has three children together.  
Aminata has requested this loan in order to invest it in agriculture. She will use it to buy rice seeds, palm kernel seeds, etc., to plant on her farm. At the end of each month, Aminata will repay the loan, using her monthly salary.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds, palm kernel seeds, etc., to plant on her farm.

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es: José Francisco de 48 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su compañera de vida y sus 5 hijos. José es un hombre muy emprendedor el cual tiene muchas ideas de negocio las cuales poco a poco va poniendo en marcha. Él ha trabajado desde hace 6 años en su negocio en el cual ofrece variedad de productos tales como: huevos, lácteos, verduras, etc. Su deseo es seguir manteniendo su negocio  activo ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos y es el que le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Su principal inspiración es su familia ya que es la que le da fuerza para seguir adelante y no pierde las esperanzas de algún día poder darles una calidad de vida diferente. Gracias a su carisma y dedicación en el trabajo ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchas personas en la zona donde habita ya que el siempre mantiene variedad de productos de buena calidad y a los mejores precios. Últimamente ha estado pensando mucho en la posibilidad de surtir su negocio, en especial en esta época navideña que normalmente las ventas aumentan. Debido a esto ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para surtir su inventario y suplir una mayor demanda. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de: huevos, lácteos, verduras, y de mas productos que sean atractivos para los clientes. Confía en Dios plenamente que obtendrá resultados favorables y podrá lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
José Francisco is 48 years old, he lives in his own home with his life partner and their 5 children. 

José is a very enterprising man who has a lot of business ideas which, one by one, he is putting into action. He has worked for 6 years in his business selling a variety of products such as eggs, dairy products, vegetables, etc. He wants to keep his business trading as it is main source of income and allows him to bring bread home everyday. 

His family is his main inspiration, they give him the strength to keep going forward and not lose hope that one day he will be able to give them a different quality of life. 

Thanks to his charisma and dedication to his work, he has managed to earn the trust of lots of people in the area where he lives as he always keeps a variety of good quality products at the best prices.

Recently, he has been thinking about the possibility of growing his business, particularly as Christmas is the time of year when sales rise. Because of this, he has taken the decision to ask for this loan from INTEGRAL in order to increase his inventory and fulfil a greater demand. He will invest the loan by buying eggs, dairy products, vegetables and other products that are appealing to his customers. He trusts fully in God that he will obtain favourable results and be able to attain his objective.

loans.use: to buy: eggs, dairy products, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Abdul S.

texts.en: Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org based in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you Abdul, a secondary school teacher in Makeni. Fifty-two-year-old Abdul has served in the teaching profession for 31 years now. A native of Makeni City, Abdul is married to a housewife and the couple has five children, some of whom are in college. Abdul has requested a loan to pay college fees for his children and also to buy house-building materials, such as bags of cement, nails, sand, etc., to build a house. At the end of each month, Abdul will use his monthly salary to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy bags of cement, nails, sand, etc., to construct a house.

loans.name: Salomie

texts.en:
Salomie  is 59 years old and lives in Gardnersville. She’s married and has five children between 22 and 35, all of whom live at home and attend college.
Salomie has been involved in a bread-baking business for three years now. She enjoys selling to customers as it enables her to help her children, and her main challenge is heat for the fire.
She’s requesting a loan to purchase more flour by the bag, oil, and sugar for her business; she would like to expand her business, as she has more customers.

loans.use: to purchase more flour by the bag, oil, and sugar for her business

loans.name: Lafia Group

texts.fr:
Les six membres du groupe LAFIA sont essentiellement de femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 38  ans, et ont en moyenne  4 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des  familles polygamiques à Sikasso (3ème région administrative du Mali). 
Elles sont à leur seizième prêt avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. 
RAMATA accroupie 1ère à gauche, fait le commerce de pagnes wax – real et tissus.  
Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt  17 pièces de pagnes wax – real et 35 kg de tissus.Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de la ville de Sikasso.
Elle les revend au  marché de Kamalen Sirakoro, de façon ambulante et en famille à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes, au comptant. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 57.000FCFA dont une partie est  utilisée  pour les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille et l’autre pour son épargne .
Elle ambitionne d’augmenter son chiffre d’affaire pour mieux satisfaire sa clientèle.
texts.en:
The six members of the LAFIA group are mostly married women with an average age of 38, and an average of 4 children each. Most live in polygamous families in Sikasso (3rd administrative district of Mali). The women are on their sixth loan with micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to satisfy customer demand. The previous loans were all fully repaid. 

Ramata, kneeling, 1st on the left, sells "pagnes real" (colorful African wax cloth) and fabric. With her loan she plans to buy 17 pieces of  "pagnes real" and 35 kg of fabric. She obtains her supplies at the Grand Market in Sikasso.She resells at the Kamalen Sirakoro market, on foot and within her family to customers who are both men and women, for cash. She expects to make an average monthly profit of 57,000 CFA some of which she will use for everyday family expenses, and the rest for savings. Her goal is to increase turnover in order to better meet the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to buy "pagne real"  wax cloth and fabric.

loans.name: Gerly

texts.es: Gerly, de 32 años, es una mujer muy generosa, amable y trabajadora. Convive con su pareja Uri de 33 años con quien tiene cuatro hijos, Willy de 15, Ariana de 10, Jim de 5 y Harold que recién nació hace unos días, es por ello que trabaja mucho para brindarles  una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. El trabajo de Gerly consiste en la venta de jugos, desde muy temprano comienza su trabajo al salir al mercado en busca de las frutas más frescas y jugosas, de esa manera sus clientes quedan satisfechos de los deliciosos jugos de fruta que prepara. Su local de venta está en  su casa, ahí arma una mesa y acondiciona un lugar para licuar y cortar sus frutas. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por 5 años y lo hace sola, además se siente contenta ya que le permite tener ingresos trabajando por medio día y el resto del tiempo puede dedicarle a su familia y a su hogar. Espera seguir trabajando con el fin de crecer su negocio. Este será el crédito número 10 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un respaldo financiero ya que le dará la garantía de seguir trabajando tranquila, ella por su parte está comprometida en seguir siendo una socia puntual en sus cuotas así como fue en anteriores créditos. Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, comprará ingredientes, insumos y frutas para la preparación de más jugos.
texts.en: Gerly, 32 years old, is a very generous, loving and hard working woman.  She lives with her spouse Uri, 33 years old, with whom she has four children: Willy 15, Ariana 10, Jim 5 and Harold who was born just days ago.  They are the reason that she works so hard, to bring a better quality of life to her family.  Gerly makes a living selling juices.  She starts her work very early in the morning as she goes to the market looking for the freshest and juiciest fruit, so that her customers can enjoy the delicious fruit juices that she prepares.  She sells from her home, where she has a table and a place where she can cut and juice the fruit.  She has been doing this work for 5 years and has been working alone.  She feels happy that it allows her to generate income by working half of the day and having the rest of the time to dedicate to her family and her home.  She hopes to continue working and growing her business.  This is loan number 10 with MFP, and she is very happy knowing that she has this financial support which will guarantee that she will be able to continue to work without worries.  On her part, she is committed to being on time in her payments, same as she has been with previous loans.  She will use the requested amount of 3000 soles to buy ingredients, supplies and fruit for the making of more juices.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and fruit for the making of juices.

loans.name: Rufilia

texts.es: Rufilia es socia del Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 41 años, se dedica a la compra y venta de cochinilla, es madre de 5 hijos, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 12 años, recuerda con mucha nostalgia que cuando ella entró a Finca Perú no tenia ningún negocio, y Finca Perú le ayudo con las capacitaciones, recuerda mucho los consejos de Morenita, ahora ya tiene su negocio y se siente muy bien con todo lo que ha logrado, aprendió a ahorrar, la responsabilidad y acerca de la escalera de éxito y escalar hasta llegar a la cima. Ahora con el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de cochinilla y tara.
texts.en: Rufilia is a member of the Tarpuy Communal Bank.  She is 41 years old and the mother of five children.  She buys and sells cochinilla (a small insect from which the crimson-colored dye carmine is derived) and tara (a Peruvian plant that's high in tannic acid content).  She has been a member of Finca Perú for twelve years.  Very nostalgically, she remembers when she came to Finca Perú.  She didn’t have a business but they provided her with training and she remembers Morenita’s advise very well.   Now, she has her business and feels very good about all that she has achieved.  She has learned how to save and be responsible.  She has also learned about the ladder of success and how to climb until she reaches the top.  With the loan she is requesting now, she will purchase cochinilla and tara.

loans.use: to purchase cochinilla and tara.

loans.name: Sadith

texts.es:
Sadith, de 29 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Wilfredo de 34 años y sus 4 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Sadith consiste en la venta de lácteos, ella compra su producto y la vende de manera ambulante, visitando casa por casa a sus clientes, quienes sabiendo de la calidad de sus productos no dudan en comprarle. Asimismo deja a crédito a tiendas donde ya tiene contratos anticipados. Empezó vendiendo poco y solo a algunos clientes pero con el tiempo fue ampliando su mercado y ahora tiene muchos mas que le compran en grandes cantidades.
Lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y considera que le esta yendo muy bien ya que tiene buenas ventas, genera buenos ingresos y además crece cada día mas y mas. Con el tiempo, espera tener una tienda donde pueda vender ella misma sus productos. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas a pagar de manera puntual con sus cuotas. Con en monto solicitado de 600 soles, comprará más productos lacteos pues tiene más demanda.
texts.en:
Sadith, 29 years old, is a simple and hard working woman.  She lives in her own home with her husband Wilfredo, 34 years old, and her 4 loved children for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life.  Sadith makes a living selling dairy products, she buys her products and sells them by going door to door to see her customers, who knowing the quality of her products do not hesitate to buy from her.  She also sells on credit to stores where she already has agreements made.  She started selling a small amount to only to certain customers, but with time her market kept growing and now she has many more that buy from her in large quantities.
She has been in this business for 2 years and she feels that it is going very well since she has many sales, generates good income and keeps growing.  In time she wants to have a store where she can sell her products.  This will be loan #2 with MFP, she is hoping for its support to continue with her goals. On the other hand she is committed once again to be timely with her payments.  With the requested 600 soles she will buy more dairy products because she has more demand.

loans.use: to purchase dairy products.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor, además de tener muchas ganas de salir adelante. Es soltero, vive en compañía de su madre, hermano, cuñado y sobrino. Juntos habitan en casa de su madre. La actividad que realiza Jorge es la venta de pollos broaster, para lo cual cuenta con un stnad movil donde perpara papas y pollos fritos. Su puesto lo instala en el frontis de su casa todas la noches, ahí atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes. Hace más de 02 años que empezó con éste negocio, y hasta el momento cuenta con el apoyo de su madre en la preparación y atención al público. Le gusta su negocio pues le permite tener un ingreso económico y una ocupación ya que le falta terminar sus estudios técnicos en computación, y con las ganancias se está pagando sus estudios. Por otro lado apoya a su madre en los gastos del hogar. Ahora él está ahorrando para que en un futuro pueda tener su propia empresa de reparación de computadoras y sentirse un profesional realizado. Este será el préstamo número 04 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecido con el apoyo financiero para poder concretar sus planes. Además de estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues  conoce a sus integrantes y los considera personas responsables. Con el monto solicitado de 2500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de utensilios para implementar su negocio, asi como ingredientes que piensa comprar a precio por mayor, así como sillas y mesas.
texts.en:
Jorge is a hard-working and entrepreneurial man who has a great desire to do well in life.  He is single and lives together with his mother, brother, sister-in-law and nephew.  They all live together in his mother's house.  Jorge's business is selling broiler chickens.  He has a mobile stand where he prepares his potatoes and fried chicken.  He sets up his stand in front of his house every evening and there he serves his customers in a very kind manner.  He started this business two years ago and, up to now, he has had his mother's help in preparing the food and serving his customers.  Jorge likes his business because it gives him an income and a job.  He is currently finishing his studies in computing and is using his profits to pay for his studies.  He also supports his mother with the household expenses.  Right now, Jorge is saving up so that, in the future, he can set up his own computer repair business and consider himself an accomplished professional.  

This will be Jorge's fourth loan from MFP.  He feels grateful for the financial support which enables him to carry out his plans.  Jorge feels happy with his community bank as he knows the other members and considers them to be responsible people.  He will invest his 2,500 soles in buying utensils for his business and ingredients, which he plans to buy wholesale.  He will also buy tables and chairs.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs, and ingredients such as chicken and potatoes for preparing his food

loans.name: María Aidé

texts.es: María Aidé de 60 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su compañero de vida, cuatro hijos, mamá y un nieto. La señora María es una mujer increíble ya que con mucho sacrificio ha logrado establecer un pequeño negocio en su hogar de residencia en el cual ofrece variedad de perfumería y ropa para damas, niños y niñas. Gracias a su carisma y buen servicio ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchas personas en la zona donde habita, por lo que ya cuenta con clientes fijos y cada día sus clientes la prefieren más, ya que cuando de de perfumería y ropa se trata ella cuenta con la mejor variedad con los precios más accesibles. Por su experiencia ha notado cuales son las temporadas en las cuales se vende más. La temporada navideña es una de ellas, en estas fechas siempre los clientes le demandan más de sus productos es por ello que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de perfumería y ropa al por mayor, con el fin de tener lo necesario a la hora que los clientes soliciten sus productos, y además  poder recibir un poco mas de ingresos que le permitan ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y seguir manteniendo su negocio activo ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
María Aidé is 60 years old and lives in her own house with her family which includes her life companion, four children, her mother and a grandson. María is an incredible woman who has made many sacrifices and has established a little business in her own home where she sells a variety of perfume and clothing for ladies, boys and girls.

Thanks to her charisma and good service she has earned the trust of many people in the area where she lives. She has an established clientele and every day her clients want more, as her perfume and clothing are a good variety with affordable prices.

Through her experience she has taken note of which seasons give her the most sales. The Christmas season is one of them as at this time the customers always ask for more of her products and this is why she is asking for a loan from Integral in order to invest in her business to buy perfume and clothing at wholesale prices, to have on hand at the moment when the customer asks for them, and also to be able to receive a little more income to permit her a better quality of life for her family and continue to keep her business alive as it is her main source of income.

loans.use: to buy perfume and clothing at wholesale prices

loans.name: San Luis (Paute) Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal San Luís está formado por 10 socias y 3 socios, quienes viven en diferentes lugares del cantón Paute que se encuentra Ubicado al noreste de la provincia del Azuay, tiene un clima sub-tropical-templado. Paute está rodeado por elevaciones con una altitud máxima de 3.700 m.s.n.m., tiene bellos paisajes y es un gran productor de frutas, flores y caña de azúcar. Su gente son personas amables, gentiles y trabajadoras, un gran ejemplo son nuestras socias quienes laboran a diario para mejorar sus situaciones económicas y sacar en adelante a sus familias.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Nelis y se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal.
 
Tiene 40 años, está casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 20, 17 y 15 años, su primer hijo estudia y trabaja y sus dos últimos hijos estudian en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en una fábrica de calzado, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.
 
Doña Nelis se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y al cuidado de su casa y como pasa la mayor parte del tiempo en casa también se dedica a la agricultura y cría de pollos y cuyes a los que los vende en su comunidad.
 
Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos, cuyes y en alimento para los mismos.
 
Su sueño es que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The San Luís community bank has 3 male and 10 female members who all live in different places in Paute canton, in the north-east of Azuay province.  This area has a sub-tropical temperate climate.  Paute is surrounded by mountains with a maximum height of 3,700 meters above sea level.  It has beautiful landscape and is a big producer of fruit, flowers and sugarcane. The locals are kind, friendly and hard-working people.  A great example of this are our members who work every day to improve their financial situation and to provide for their families.

One of the members of this group is Nelis.  This is the second loan that she has requested through the community bank.  Nelis is 40 years old, married, and has three children from her marriage who are 20, 17 and 15 years old.  Her eldest son is studying and working, and her two younger children are attending high school in the city.  Nelis' husband works in a shoe factory.  They own their own home.

Nelis is a homemaker and, as she spends most of her time at home, she also farms and raises chickens and guinea pigs which she sells in her community.  She will invest her loan in buying chickens, guinea pigs and feed.

Nelis' dream is for her children to finish their studies and become professionals.

loans.use: to buy chickens, guinea pigs, and animal feed

loans.name: Mohamed S.

texts.en:
In the photo above is Mohamed, a 49-year-old secondary school teacher in the city of Makeni, located in northern Sierra Leone. A teacher for 30 years now, he is married to a teacher and the couple has five children who are attending secondary school.

Mohamed has requested this loan from SMT/Kiva lenders in order to buy house-building materials like zinc, nails, cement, etc. for the construction of a house. He will also invest some of the loan in agriculture.

loans.use: to buy house-building materials like zinc, nails, cement, etc. for the construction of a house.

loans.name: Maximiliana

texts.es: Maximiliana, de 40 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de progresar, es conviviente con Rolando quien es mototaxista, fruto de esa unión tiene 03 hijos de 22, 20 y 14 años de edad, instalado cómodamente en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Maximiliana es la venta de abarrotes de primera necesidad para eso cuenta con un bodega instalada en su propia casa, donde atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes. Tiene más de 02 años en este negocio y gracias a un capital propio tuvo la oportunidad de emprender su propia tienda. Le gusta la actividad que realiza, pues le permite adminsitra su tiempo para no descuidar su hogar. Por otro lado los ingresos económicos que le genera le han ayudado para aportar a la economía de su hogar. Lo que no le gusta es que algunos de sus clientes le solicitan créditos por sus compras por lo que al final no terminan de pagar. Su mayor prioridad es abrir otro negocio que sería un restaurante en su casa ya que tiene conocimientos de cocina y desea ponerlos en practica. Este será el préstamo número 01 con la institución MFP. Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de prodcutos de primera necesidad  al por mayor, para así tener mayores márgenes de ganancias.
texts.en:
Maximiliana, 40, is a hardworking and industrious woman with great desire to progress.  She lives with Rolando, her partner, who is a mototaxi driver and they have 3 children, 22, 20 and 14, all living comfortably in their own house.  Maximiliana sells basic staples and she has a store in her house where she cheerfully takes care of customers.  She has had this business for more than 2 years and thanks to her own capital, she was able to open her own store.  What she likes about this work is that it allows her to keep her own schedule so that she doesn’t neglect her house.  Also the earnings that have been generated help her with the household expenses.  What she doesn’t like is that some of her customers ask for credit for their purchases and at the end, don’t pay it off.
Her biggest priority is to open another business, like a restaurant, in her house since she knows how to cook and wants to put her skills to use.  This will be her first loan with MFP.  Because of this she is hoping for a small loan so that she can fulfill her objectives and she has requested 800 new sols to buy basic staples wholesale, and thus have greater profit margins.

loans.use: to buy basic staples to stock her store

loans.name: Lola

texts.es: Lola, de 48 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser amable y  cordial. Está casada con Cesar quien es contador de profesión, fruto de esa unión tienen 02 hijos a quienes quiere mucho. Juntos habitan en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Lola, es el alquiler de su motocarro a un amigo al que consideran ser responsable. Dicho vehículo lo compró con sus ahorros hace 08 años. Por otro lado posee un terreno de 10 hectáreas en donde siembra palma aceitera, producto que tiene mucha demanda. Tiene 04 años y hasta el momento no se ha quejado de los ingresos que le ha generado dicha actividad. Le gusta su negocio pues le permite contar con un ingreso económico adicional con el cual pueda solventar sus gastos, así como el sentirse ocupada y una mujer empresaria, con muchas ganas de sobresalir. Sin embargo cuando su motocarro se malogra le ocasiona muchos gastos en vez de ganancias, pero eso no la desanima ya que cuenta con otros ingresos, con los cuales  puede apoyarse. Este será el préstamo número 05 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, se siente a gusto con su banco comunal pues los considera ser buenas personas. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la cosecha de su producción de palma aceitera como contratar jornaleros.
texts.en: Lola, 48 years old, is a hard working and diligent woman in addition to being kind and cordial.  She is married to Cesar who is an accountant by profession. They have two children whom they love very much.  Together they live in their own home.  Lola rents out her car to a friend who she considers to be very responsible.  She bought this car 8 years ago with her savings.  She also has 10 acres of land where she grows oil palms, a product which has much demand.  She has been doing this for 4 years and as of yet has not complained about the income that this activity generates.  She likes this business because it allows her to bring in additional income to cover expenses and also feel busy and as a business woman with strong desires to get ahead.  When her car breaks down, however, it brings her many expenses instead of income, this does not upset her because she can count on the other income with which she can support herself.  This will be loan # 5 with MFP, and she looks for its support so that she can continue with her goals.  She feels good about her community bank and feels that they are good people.  The loan amount of 1000 soles she will invest in the planting of her oil palm product and contract laborers.

loans.use: to contract laborers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials to build more rooms

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida lives in the city of Kampala, Uganda.  She is single and has three children, all of whom are in school.  

Aida has a business of selling charcoal. She has been in this business for ten years, and she works six days out of every week. Aida sells her products at the market, by means of retail. 

Aida has requested a loan from MCDT SACCO for 600,000 Ugandan Shillings, which she will use to buy more bags of charcoal. The main business challenges for Aida include transportation and seasonality.  Her goals and aspirations for her business are to become a wholesaler and also to own a delivery van to ease transportation.  

Aida lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and doesn't have access to piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: to buy more bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Sulaiman A.

texts.en:
We are very please to introduce to you Mr. Sulaiman, a secondary school teacher in Makeni, a city in northern Sierra Leone. Born in the village of Rochen in northern Sierra Leone, the fifty-three-year-old is married to a teacher and the couple has five children. Sulaiman has come to Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva, to apply for a loan. With the help of this loan, he can solve some of the financial challenges that he cannot solve with his salary alone. But with the help of this loan, he can meet some of his immediate financial challenges and then repay the loan using his monthly salary. 

Mr. Sulaiman will use this loan to buy building materials like iron, corrugated zinc, sand, nails, cement, etc. for the construction of a house.

loans.use: to buy building materials like iron, corrugated zinc, sand, nails, cement, etc. for the construction of a house

loans.name: Momodu Aly

texts.en:
Pictured above is Momodu, a teacher in one of the secondary schools in Makeni. He has come to Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva, to apply for a loan. Like other teachers, he wants this loan in order to meet some financial commitments that his salary alone cannot solve. But with the help of a loan, he can meet this challenge and at the end of each month, he will use his monthly salary to repay the loan. 

Momodu was born in eastern Sierra Leone. He is married to a teacher and the couple has three children who are attending primary school. Momodu has served in the teaching profession for thirty-eight years now. He has requested this loan in order to buy building materials like bags of cements for the construction of a family house.

loans.use: to buy building materials like bags of cements for the construction of a family house

loans.name: Norah

texts.en:
Norah is 38 years old and lives in Gardnersville. She is married, her husband is a driver, and they have two children between 6 and 13 years old, who are in school and live at home.

She has been selling biscuits and body cream, she started this business with money given to her by her husband, and learned this way of selling from her mother-in-law.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more biscuits and body cream for her business; her plan is to build her shop.

loans.use: to purchase more biscuits and body cream for her business

loans.name: Sabaly Group

texts.fr:
Les quatre membres du groupe SABALY sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 42  ans, et ont en moyenne  6 enfants. Elles vivent dans des  familles polygamiques à  Sikasso (3ème région administrative du Mali). 
Elles sont à leur quatorzième collaboration avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle, les prêts passés se sont bien dénoués. 
WASSA debout et 1ère à droite, fait la vente de condiments dans  le groupe SABALY .
Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt,  des condiments (tomate fraîche, oignon frais, sel de cuisine, cube Magie, poudre de gombo et du Sounbala. 
Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages avoisinants de Kamalen Sirakoro et au grand marché de Sikasso.
Elle les revend au comptant au  marché de Kamalen Sirakoro à une place fixe et en famille à une clientèle composée de femmes. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 27.000FCFA dont une partie est épargnée et l’autre utilisée  pour les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en: The four members of the group SABALY are married women who average 42 years of age and 6 children each. The women live in polygamous families in Sikasso (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). They are on their 14th collaboration with the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso to meet the needs of their customers. The past loans have been settled. WASSA, who is the first one standing from the right, sells condiments in the SABALY group. She intends to use her loan to buy some condiments: fresh tomatoes, fresh onions, table salt, Magie (bouillon cubes), okra powder, and sounbala (a flavoring of pounded and fermented seeds). Her supplies come from villages near Kamalen Sirakoro and from the big market of Sikasso. She resells them for cash at the Kamalen Sirakoro market at a fixed location. Her customers are women and family members. WASSA envisions making an average monthly profit 27,000 francs CFA. Part of the profits is saved, and part is used for day-to-day family expenses.

loans.use: to buy condiments

loans.name: Saby

texts.es: Saby, de 33 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora con muchas ganas de sobresalir. Esta separada del padre de su hija. Pero vive en compañía de su padre, madre, su hija de 8 años de edad, instalados cómodamente en la casa de sus padres. La actividad que realiza Saby, es el venta de madera, siendo estas de manera periódica a la ciudad de Lima donde ya tiene una cartera de clientes, además de personas de confianza que se encarga de los tramites administrativos de dicha venta. Tiene más de 2 años realizando éste negocio. Paralelo a estas actividades también cuenta con una librería instalada en su casa, la cual tiene 01 año de funcionamiento, contando con el apoyo de su madre para la atención al público. Le gusta ambos negocios que tiene pues le permite tener un ingreso económico con el cual puede pagar los gastos de su hogar y la educación de su pequeña hija. Ella considera rentable la venta de madera, por tanto tiene planes de aumentar el volumen de su mercadería. Del mismo no desea descuidar su librería asi que también comprará productos para abastecerlo. Este será el préstamo número 01 con la institución MFP, por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado, se siente bien con su banco comunal pues lo considera un grupo bastante concertador. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de madera para cubrir la demanda que tiene pendiente por enviar.
texts.en:
Saby is 33 years old. She is a working woman and entrepreneur who wants very much to excel. She is separated from the father of her daughter. She lives with her father, mother and her 8 year old daughter, situated comfortably in her parent’s house.

Saby’s activity is selling wood, and she does this regularly in the city of Lima where she has a following of clients, in addition to people with a trust obligation in the administrative proceedings of said sales.

Alongside this activity she also has a bookstore in her home, which has been open for one year, with the support of her mother to assist the public. She likes both business as they let her have financial earnings with which she can pay the household expenses and the education for her little daughter. She considers the sale of wood to be profitable, so she wants to increase the volume of merchandise. Not wanting to neglect her bookstore she also wants to buy products to stock it. 

This will be her first loan with MFP, and she is hoping for your cooperation so that she can finalize her plans. Further, she feels very good about the communal bank as she considers it a harmonious group. With the 1000 soles from the loan she will buy wood in order to meet the order that is waiting to be sent.

loans.use: to buy more wood

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria, de 49 años es una mujer alegre. Vive en compañía de su hija Rosmery a la que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Huasapuquio. Desde pequeña, se dedicó a la agricultura, esta actividad le permitió mantener a su hija por sus propios medios; pues no tiene esposo. A pesar que ya es mayor y su hija independiente, continúa trabajando. Su actividad es la compra y venta de queso fresco y de buena calidad, cada 15 días viaja a la capital del país, donde comercializa al queso a sus clientes, que ya son conocedores de su negocio. Además como dice ella “si la fuerza la acompaña”, siembra maíz, habas y papa, para su consumo propio, en pequeños huertos. Asimismo posee 3 vacas y 2 terneros, que cuida con mucho esmero; ya que le proporcionan la leche que necesita para realizar su negocio, pero como no producen leche constante, compra queso a terceras personas para abastecer sus pedidos. Este es el sexto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas.
