Felipe is 28 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married and has 2 children. 

Felipe provides motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan for 14,000 PHP to buy tools & pay for the gasoline for the services.

Felipe has been a member of HSPFI since 2009.  In the future, Felipe hopes to improve his services.

loans.use: buy tools and gas

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is 55 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is a widow with 4 children. 

Victoria has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for  6 years. She requested a loan for 14,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages to resell.

Victoria has been a member of HSPFI since 2009.  In the future, Victoria hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: buy canned goods, snacks & beverages

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna, de 34 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Royser de 42 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes educa y cría con valores sólidos y buenos modales, asimismo trabaja mucho para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Reyna es la compra y venta de pescado, caminando por la calle distribuye a sus caseros su producto, el cual compra a precios muy accesibles. Ella tiene muchos clientes, ya que vende el pescado más fresco y sabroso. Es una vendedora muy alegre, que siempre saca a sus clientes una sonrisa. Le gusta su trabajo porque le genera buenas ganancias ya que siempre tiene buenas ventas. Lleva 11 años realizando está actividad, al principio cuando se inicio con este trabajo le era muy complicado ya que tenía que aprender el negocio de cómo conservar el pescado fresco y en el intento se le malograron y perdió mucha inversión, pero con el tiempo logró aprender y ahora le está yendo mucho mejor. Espera tener en el futuro un pequeño frigorífico donde conservar sus pescados sin temor a que se malogren. Este será el crédito número 3 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá mas segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual ya que no desea quedar mal con su grupo comunal. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará más pescado, ya que últimamente está teniendo más demanda y desea ampliar la mercadería de su producto.
texts.en: Reyna is a 34 year old, very friendly, and hard-working woman who lives in her own home with her husband, who is 42 years old, and three beloved children. She educates them and raises them with solid values and moral behavior. She also works very hard to offer her children a good quality life. She buys and sells fish and distributes her product by foot to neighbors and sell them for reasonable prices. She has many clients since she sells the freshest and tastiest fish. She is a joyful seller who is always able to get a smile out of her customers. She likes her job since she makes high profits from her sales. She has been doing this for 11 years. In the beginning, it was complicated since she had to learn how to keep the fish fresh and in the process she lost a large investment. However, with time she learned how to maintain them fresh and is doing much better. In the future, she hopes to have a refrigerator to keep her fish fresh and not have to worry about them rotting. This will be her third loan with MFP. She is very happy in knowing that she will have financial support since she will have more confidence growing her business. She commits herself once more to make the monthly payments in a punctual manner because she does not want to disappoint her communal group. With the 1500 Peruvian soles she will buy more fish because lately she has had a higher demand and wants to increase the amount of merchandise she has.

loans.use: buy more fish.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda, de 35 años es una mujer dedicada a su familia. Vive en compañía de Richard, su esposo desde hace 12 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos menores a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Daniel Hernández. Hace poco cerro su tienda de comestibles, que abrió con mucho esfuerzo. Pues se dedicó a su familia en cuerpo y alma, sin descuidar sus objetivos. Mientras su esposo trabaja como albañil construyendo casa y realizando acabados de calidad, según cuenta gana muy bien en su oficio. “Todo depende de la contrata que asume con los clientes”, afirma. A más tiempo que se demore en realizar la construcción, gana más. Pero como es un hombre responsable, trabaja los fines de semana con un motocarro, en el trasporte público, donde gana un dinero extra. Ahora su principal objetivo es construir una casa nueva, para alquilar a terceras personas y obtener un ingreso de dinero seguro. Ya que desean ahorrar dinero para los estudios de sus hijos. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Yolanda, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en construir su casa en un terreno que compró hace poco.
texts.en:
Yolanda, 35, is a woman dedicated to her family.  She lives with Richard, her husband of 12 years.  Together they have three minor children for whom they care in their own house, located in the town of Daniel Hernández.

Not too long ago she closed her food store, which she opened with great effort.  Then she devoted herself to her family with heart and soul, without neglecting her objectives, while her husband works as a bricklayer building houses and doing quality finishes.  According to what she says, he earns a good living in his work.  "Everything depends on the contract he has with the clients," she states.  The longer it takes to do the building, the more he earns.  But since he is a responsible man, he works on the weekend with a motorcycle taxi, in public transportation, where he earns extra money.

Now her principal objective is to build a new house, to rent to other people and obtain a fixed income because they want to save money for their children's studies.

This is her fifth loan with MFP.  She hopes for your collaboration so she can achieve her plans.  On the other hand, she promises to make her payments on time.  Also, it pleases her to be part of her bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.

If she receives your support, Yolanda will invest the requested money in building her house on a plot of land she bought a short time ago.

loans.use: to build her house.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
La señora  Marina  vive en una localidad pequeña ella  vive en unión libre con el señor  Omar con quien   procreo  dos hijos que a un están   a su  responsabilidad.
 
      Ella solicito el préstamo  en la compra y venta de pollos de granja para luego  venderlo  en su misma localidad en la que lleva  trabajando  un año  y diez meses  y comenta que le va bien  ya que con su pequeña actividad mejora cada día más sus ingresos.

     Para dedicarse a ello inicio   por si sola ya que también quiere apoyar  su esposo  con los gastos  que se generan en su  familia.
 

      Lo que  desea   de su negocio  es que pueda seguir a horrando para comprar una bascula en donde pueda pesar los pollos por kilo.
texts.en:
Marina lives in a small town.  She lives in a common-law relationship with Omar, and they have two children who are still in their care.  She is asking for a loan for the purchase and sale of farm chickens in order to raise and sell them in her town, the same town that she has been working in for the past year and 10 months.  She comments that things are going well and that her small business activity helps improve her income a bit every day. 

Marina started the business on her own because she wanted to help her husband with the family expenses.  What she most desires for her business is to be able to continue saving money in order to purchase a scale where she can weigh the chickens by the kilo.

loans.use: to pay for the purchase and sale of chickens

loans.name: Kea

texts.en:
Kea, 62, is widowed and resides with four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia, a region which is well known for its historical tourism sites (ancient temples: Angkor Wat, Bayon, Banteay Srey). 

Kea has been running a souvenirs shop for tourists for over ten years and is successful in her career. Her twenty-year-old daughter has been running a grocery store for over ten years as well.  

In order to improve her family’s living condition, Kea is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase more groceries for her daughter to sell in order to generate more income to support the family.  In the future, she would like to rent one store or more for selling souvenirs. In addition, she plans to rebuild her house to be much stronger, provide a better living condition for her family, and support her children to study until they get their bachelor degree.

loans.use: buy groceries to resell

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child. 

Myrna has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for 4 years. Her husband works providing motorcycle services. Myrna has requested a loan for 11,000 PHP to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Myrna has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
María de los Ángeles  vive e n una localidad pequeña ella es casada con el señor   Ramiro y con quien procreo   dos hijos que a un están a su responsabilidad.
 
     Ella solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de  trastes de platico en donde  lleva trabajando  un año en la que  comenta que le va bien ya que  con ello ha mejorado muchos sus ingresos para su negocio  y familia.
 
     Ella inicio por si sola ya que   también quiere a poyar a su  esposo con los ingresos de la casa y darle lo más necesario  as su pequeña familia.

      Lo que más desea es que con esta pequeña actividad  y el préstamo pueda seguir trabajando  y rentar un local en el pueblo para  poder exhibir sus  trastes y colchas  que también vende.
texts.en: María de los Ángeles lives in a small town.  She is married to Ramiro and they have two children who are in their care.   She is requesting a loan in order to invest in the purchase of plastic containers for sale.  She has been working in this area for one year and she comments that things are going well and that she has improved her income for the business and the family.  She began the business on her own and she wants to support her husband with household expenses and give all the necessities to her small family.  What she most desires with her small activity and the loan is to be able to continue working and to rent a shop in town where she can exhibit her plastic containers and bedspreads and also sell them.

loans.use: To pay for the purchase of plastic containers

loans.name: Anna Rose

texts.en:
Anna Rose is 29 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child.
 
Anna Rose has a shop that sells jewelry like necklaces & bracelets & accessories like watches. She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan of 11,000 PHP to buy stocks of jewelry & personal accessories to sell.

Anna Rose has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Anna Rose hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy jewelry & personal accessories to sell

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children. 

Vilma is providing manicure & pedicure services. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 9,000 PHP to buy materials needed for manicure & pedicure services.

Vilma has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Vilma hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for manicure & pedicure services

loans.name: Srey

texts.en: Srey, 51, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia, an area which is well known for its historical tourism sites (ancient temples: Angkor Wat, Bayon, Banteay Srey, etc) She has been selling groceries at home for over two years and is successful in her career. Her husband is a General Manager in a Television Network. In order to improve her family’s living condition, Srey is requesting a loan of USD 600 to purchase more groceries to sell in order to generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her house to make it much stronger and to provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell

loans.name: Santa Catarina Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Santa Catarina está conformado por las señoras Alicia, Lorena Rosalba, Maurilia Francisca, Maurilia Eulogia van a comprar con su préstamo harina, aceite, pintura, bolsa, la señora Fulgencio Genoveva va a comprar oblea por mayoreo, bolsa y cinta canela. La señora Lorena Rosalba tiene 32 años de edad, ella estudio hasta el 3er. año de primaria, ella es casada, ella tiene 3  hijos 2 varones y 1 mujer, todos están estudiando 2 la primaria y el niño pequeño en preescolar, ella elabora oblea, ella  solicito su préstamo para comprar harina, aceite, pintura, bolsa y cinta canela para tener material en existencia para ir trabajando, ella inicio su negocio hace 16 años viendo como su esposo elaboraba las obleas, su esposo fue comprando las maquinas con lo de su trabajo de campesino, su negocio es importante porque le va dejando recursos y tiene trabajo del diario, ella esta orgullos de elaborar obleas, en su comunidad casi todos se dedican a este negocio. Ella está feliz con este préstamo que va a recibir se va a surtir de los materiales para trabajar y tenerlos almacenados. Sus sueños y esperanza son seguir trabajando que no falten los pedidos y que sus hijos sigan estudiando. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “les agradecemos sus préstamos esperamos nos sigan apoyando, les agradecemos su ayuda para seguir creciendo los negocios”
texts.en: The Santa Catarina group consists of Alicia, Lorena Rosalba, Maurilia Francisca and Maurilia Eulogia, who plan to use the loan to purchase flour, oil, paint and bags. Fulgencio Genoveva plans to use it to purchase wafers, bags and masking tape at wholesale. Lorena Rosalba is 32 years old, has a third-grade education and is married with three children, two boys and a girl, who are all in school. She makes wafers and is requesting the loan to purchase flour, oil, paint, bags and masking tape to have the necessary materials to continue working. She started the business 16 years ago while watching her husband also make wafers so he could buy machinery to do farm work. Her business is important because it supplies resources and gives her daily work. She is proud to make wafers. In her community almost everyone makes a living in this business. She is happy about the loan so she can stock up on supplies. Her hopes and dreams are to keep working so she keeps receiving orders and for her children to keep studying. The members of the group want to tell Kiva and Fundación Realidad, "We thank you for the loans and we hope you keep supporting us. We thank you for the help in growing our businesses."

loans.use: to purchase flour, oil, paint, bags, masking tape, etc.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
This is Nida, 33, a resident of Tanza, Cavite City, Philippines. She is married to George, her business partner, and she is a mother to her two children. By the grace of God, she has managed to support all her children’s educational needs. 

Nida operates an appliances repair shop. Her husband handles the technical part while she handles finances, accounts, inventories and promotion. They offer repair and check-up of all types of appliances like electric fans, washing machines, air-con and other items. Her shop is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 300 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day. 

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 14,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy spare parts for appliances. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Nida hopes her business grows and dreams of being able to give her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for spare parts and supplies needed in her appliance repair shop business

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel is 35 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married. 

Maribel has a shop that sells homemade sausage or longganisa. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 9,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients for making homemade sausage.

Maribel has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Maribel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients to make sausage

loans.name: Tomasa  Socorro

texts.es:
La señora  Tomasa Socorro  es madre soltera  tiene  cuarenta siete años de edad  es una señora alegre, amable  que trabaja día a día  por lograr sus sueños.
Doña Toma como mejor la conocen sus compañeras de grupo y las personas de su comunidad   se dedican a la venta de artículos para dama y a la elaboración de vestidos.
Doña Toma  nos cuenta que lo que mas le gusta  de su negocio  es  es elaborar la ropa ya que elabora solamente ropa para dama.
Tiene  tres hijos  José Fernando, Juliana Jazmín y María de los Ángeles quienes la apoyan en entregar los pedidos a domicilio  mientras que doña Toma  termina los pedidos faltantes.
Doña Toma  también se dedica a la venta de colchas y sombrillas para obtener más ganancias y hacer que su negocio  crezca.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de: hilos, tela, botones, cierres y artículos para dama.
Les  da  las  gracias  fundación por ayudar a las madres solteras como ella para que cumplan sus sueños  y puedan darle una mejor vida a sus hijos y prepáralos  para su futuro.
texts.en: Tomasa Socorro is a 40 year-old single mother.  She is a happy and kind woman who works day by day in order to achieve her dreams.  She is known as Doña Toma by the other members of her group and of the community, and she works selling women's clothing and sewing dresses.  Doña Toma tells us that what she likes best about her business is making clothes since she only sews clothing for women.  She has three children, José Fernando, Juliana Jazmín and María de los Ángeles, who all help her by delivering purchases to people's homes while Doña Toma finishes the outstanding requests.  Doña Toma also works selling bedspreads and umbrellas in order to earn more income and to help her business grow.  She asked for a loan in order to purchase the following: thread, fabric, buttons, zippers, and women's clothing.  She thanks the Kiva partner foundation for helping single women like herself so that they can achieve their dreams and can provide a better quality of life for their children and prepare them for the future.

loans.use: to purchase material for making clothes and to purchase women's clothing

loans.name: Chandy

texts.en: Chandy, 39, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia, an area which is well known for its historical tourism sites (ancient temples: Angkor Wat, Bayon, Banteay Srey, etc). She has been selling vegetables for over two years and is successful in her career. Her husband helps her run the business. Her son is a tuk tuk taxi driver. In order to improve her family's livelihood, Chandy is requesting a loan of USD 1,000 to purchase a new motorbike for her son for hauling his tuk tuk trailer. By doing so, her son would easily run his business because he has a new motorbike and he can attract more customers. In the future, she would like to expand her business, rebuild her house and support her children to study until they get a Bachelor's degree.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike for her son for hauling his tuk tuk trailer

loans.name: Nimfa

texts.en:
Nimfa is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children.
 
Nimfa has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 12 years. She requested a loan for PHP 9,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Nimfa has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Nimfa hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew is 27 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is single with one child.
 
Andrew is providing motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for five years. He requested a loan for PHP 9,000 to buy tools & pay for the gasoline for the services.

Andrew has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Andrew hopes to improve his services.

loans.use: to buy tools & pay for gasoline

loans.name: Jeffrey

texts.en:
Jeffrey is 35 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with four children.
 
Jeffrey has a shop that sells souvenir products made from seashells. He has had this business for 14 years. He requested a loan for PHP 9,000 to buy materials needed for making souvenirs out of seashells.

Jeffrey has been a member of HSPFI for since 2009.  In the future, Jeffrey hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for making souvenirs out of seashells

loans.name: Araceli

texts.en:
Araceli is 45 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child

Araceli has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 12 years. She requested a loan for PHP 9,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Araceli has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Araceli hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages

loans.name: Leopoldo

texts.en:
Leopoldo is 60 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 7 children. 
Leopoldo has a shop that sells fish like mackerel & trout. He has had this business for 3 years. He requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy fish for sale.
Leopoldo has been a member of HSPFI since 2008.  In the future, Leopoldo hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy fish for sale

loans.name: Vella

texts.en:
Vella is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 7 children. 
Vella has a shop that sells viands & snacks like chicken & pork adobo, maruya (banana fritters) & hot cakes or pancakes. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy raw ingredients for the viands & snacks she makes for sale.
Vella has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Vella hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for the viands & snacks she makes for sale

loans.name: Maricela

texts.es:
La señora Maricela  vive en unión libre con el señor Alfonso  y con quien  procreo  un hijo quien tiene la edad de seis años.

       Ella solicito el préstamo  para invertirlo en la compra de  plásticos como son: charolas, ollas, vasos, entre otros en donde lleva trabajando   diez meses en la  que comenta que le va bien  ya que con ello  ha logrado  mejor muchos ingresos  para su pequeña  familia.

      Ella comenzó con su actividad ya que  no solo quiere depender   de los ingresos de su esposo y  así los dos trabajar para darle el más necesario para su  familia.

      Lo que más desea es que con ello  pueda seguir mejorando   su negocio  así poder  aumentar cada día  más su pequeña actividad.
texts.en: Maricela lives with her common-law husband Alfonso, with whom she has a 6-year-old son. She is requesting the loan to purchase plastic items like trays, pots, cups and other supplies. She has been doing this job for 10 months and says that it is going well because she has earned a lot of revenue for her small family. She started this activity because she didn't want to solely depend on her husband's wages, and with the two of them working they can provide more for their family. What she wants most is to keep improving her business so she can earn a little more each day.

loans.use: to purchase plastic dishes.

loans.name: Rodora

texts.en:
Rodora is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. 
Rodora has a shop that sells fish like trout, sardines & mackerel. Her husband is providing motorcycle services.  She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy fish for sale.
Rodora has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Rodora hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fish for sale

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 1 child. 
Mario has a blacksmith shop that makes, sells & repairs swords. He has had this business for 10 years. He requested a loan for 8,000 to buy tools needed in the blacksmith shop.
Mario has been a member of HSPFI for since 2011. In the future, Mario hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy tools needed in the blacksmith shop

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: El señor Ricardo trabaja desde hace 9 años en una pequeña tienda adecuada en la sala de su casa, la cual inició con un dinero que su hija le dio. El horario de trabajo del señor Ricardo es de todos los días de 8:00 a.m a 7:00 p.m, siempre con el ánimo de poder apoyar la carga de gastos familiares y brindarle a su esposa y dos hijos una buena calidad de vida. El señor Ricardo tiene necesidad de surtir su negocio para ofrecer una buena oferta a sus clientes y mejorar sus ventas. El sueño del señor Ricardo es tener su tienda en un local independiente y capacitarse en el oficio de la panadería.
texts.en:
For the past nine years, Sr. Ricardo has worked in a small store situated in the living room of his house. He started this business with money that his daughter had given him. Sr. Ricardo’s work schedule is from 8am to 7pm every day. He is always motivated to help with the family expenses and provide his wife and two children a better quality of life.

Sr. Ricardo needs to restock his business so that he can provide a good array of products to his customers and improve his sales. His dream is to have a store in an independent location and to receiving training so that he can start a bakery.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as canned foods, beverages, sausages, cigarettes, and household cleaning products.

loans.name: Oscar Francisco

texts.es:
Oscar, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 3 y 5 años de edad, él se dedica a la venta de hot dog y tortas mejicanas, este negocio nació hace tres años. Lo atiende él y su esposa, se apoyan para tratar de llevar su hogar  y que sus hijos no pasen necesidades mayores.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de  mercadería como carnes, aceite, condimentos,  tambien invertirá en la reparación del carrito donde transporta la venta, este préstamo le ayudara mucho a Oscar, para mejorar el negocio  y que sus ventas sean mejores. 
El propósito de él es fortalecer el negocio, tener todo lo necesario para mejorar los ingresos familiares y cubrir las necesidades de  sus hijos.
texts.en:
Oscar lives with his wife and two children who are three and five years of age. He earns a living selling hotdogs and sandwiches, a business which he started up three years ago. Both he and his wife manage the business and help each other in trying to maintain the household and make sure their children do not lack for important things. 

He is seeking a loan for the purchase of ingredients such as meat, oil and condiments. He will also invest in repairs to the cart he uses to carry the food for sale. This loan will be a great help to Oscar in improving the business and increasing sales. His goal is to strengthen the business, have everything necessary for improving the family's income, and meet the needs of his children.

loans.use: to purchase meat, oil and condiments.

loans.name: Carlos Mario

texts.es:
Carlos, es comerciante de ropa, vive con su madre, tiene 26 años de edad, él administra su propio negocio de ropa, trabaja de lunes a domingo, desde hace tres años  ofreciendo prendas de vestir femeninas y masculinas.
Actualmente necesita realizar una inversión  en ropa nueva,  solicitando un préstamo para realizar la inversión en pantalones jeans y de vestir, además camisas y camisetas, esta compra de nueva mercadería, le dará mayor estabilidad con el negocio, mejorando las ventas.
El objetivo de Carlos es mejorar el negocio, trabajar de una forma responsable con el pago de las cuotas y así podrá mejorar el apoyo que le brinda a su madre.
texts.en:
Carlos is a clothing merchant. He lives with his mother and is 26 years old. For three years he has run his own clothing business and works from Monday to Friday selling clothing apparel for men and women. 

Currently he needs to make an investment in new clothing. He is requesting a loan to invest in jeans and dress pants as well as shirts and t-shirts. This purchase of new merchandise will give him greater stability with the business, improving sales. The objectives of Carlos are to improve the business, work responsibly in making his payments, and thus be able to improve the support he gives his mother.

loans.use: to purchase jeans and dress pants, shirts and t-shirts.

loans.name: Yohalmo Israel

texts.es:
Yohalmo, vive con su esposa y su hija, tiene casa propia, él se dedica a atender un negocio de granja de pollos y venta de huevos, este negocio inicio hace tres años junto a su padre, pero desde hace 8 meses se lo heredo, por lo que debe buscar las alternativas para mantenerlo competente.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de concentrado, medicamentos para los pollos de la granja, con lo que espera mantener la suficiente cantidad de productos para alimentarlas y los medicamentos necesarios para que estén sanos.
La aspiración de Yohalmo es que sus clientes se sientan satisfechos con el producto que vende (huevos), además de ofrecerle a su familia una vida confortable.
texts.en:
Yohalmo lives with his wife and daughter and has his own home. He earns a living managing a poultry and egg-selling business. He began this business three years ago together with his father, but inherited it eight months ago and so he must look for alternatives for keeping it viable. 

He is seeking a loan for purchasing concentrate and medicines for the chickens and hopes thus to maintain adequate quantities of products for feeding them and the required medicines for keeping them healthy. 

Yohalmo's aspiration is that his customers would be satisfied with the product he sells (eggs), as well as offering his family a comfortable life.

loans.use: to purchase concentrate and medicines for poultry.

loans.name: Bienbenida Catalina

texts.es: Bienbenida Catalina es una trabajadora del centro de salud de la comunidad donde ella habita, ya tiene varios años de trabajar para esa empresa, el sueño de Bienbenida era tener su vivienda y acondicionarla muy bien, el salario que ella genera no le cumbre para  poder realizar las mejoras de la casa, por lo tanto está solicitando para poder realizar las mejoras de la casa con el crédito que está solicitando comprara materiales para construir entre otros.
texts.en: Bienbenida Catalina is a worker in a health clinic in the community where she lives. She has worked for this business several years now. Bienbenida's dream was to have her own living quarters and make them very comfortable. The salary she earns is not enough for her to be able to make the improvements to the house, and so she is seeking the loan in order to make improvements to the house. She will buy construction materials among other items.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Ubaydulo

texts.ru: Убайдуло проживает в районе Дангара. Ему 46 лет. Он женат. У него 9 детей. Он занимается животноводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается 7 лет. Кредит берет для закупа крупнорогатого скота, чтобы увеличить их количество.
texts.en: Ubaydulo is from the Dangara region. He is 46 years old, married and a father of nine children. Ubaydulo raises cattle and has been running his business for the last seven years. He is taking out this loan to purchase more cattle for his herd.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Yatim

texts.ru: Ятим житель района Дангара. Возраст, 61 год. Он женат. У него трое детей. Ятим более шести лет занимается скотоводством. Он берет кредит для закупа несколько голов мелко - рогатого скота.
texts.en: Yatim lives in the Danghara region. He is 61 years old, married and has three children. Yatim has had a herd of cattle for the last six years and wants to take out this loan to purchase a few more animals for his herd.

loans.use: to purchase a few sheep/goats

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
Lorenzo, vive en casa propia, está acompañado de su esposa y dos hijos de 13 y 7 años de edad, él trabaja la agricultura desde joven, ya tiene experiencia en esta actividad, ya que lo realiza año con año, para poder generar ingresos para su familia.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de herbicidas, abono y semilla, estos materiales para iniciar la nueva siembra, este préstamo le ayudara para obtener lo necesario e iniciar su labor agrícola.
Su aspiración es mejorar económicamente, a través del trabajo en la agricultura, que sus siembras sean abundantes.
texts.en: Lorenzo lives in his own home with his wife and 13- and 7-year-old children. He has a lot of experience in agriculture and has worked in that sector since he was young and has continued year after year in order to support his family. He is currently requesting a loan to buy herbicides, fertilizer, and seeds for the start of the next harvest. This loan will help him to obtain all that is necessary for his farming work. His dream is to improve his economic situation through his work so that his crops will be abundant.

loans.use: to buy herbicide, fertilizer, and seeds.

loans.name: Nerith

texts.es: Nerith, de 52 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Jeremías de 53 años y sus 2 queridas hijas Adriana de 20 y Anaé de 18 años, a quienes desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Nerith consiste en la venta de flores en las afueras del cementerio de su ciudad, Ahí tiene un puesto donde vende flores, y en pequeñas cajitas acomoda sus rosas, claveles, violetas. Trabaja sola ya que con el transcurrir del tiempo aprendió a darse tiempo para todo. Le gusta mucho de su trabajo pues disfruta de conversar con otras vendedoras al mismo tiempo que ofrece sus flores a las diversas personas que entran a visitar las tumbas y mausoleos de sus familiares. Lleva  11 años en éste negocio y le está yendo muy bien, aunque todavía no se siente realizada, ya que desea poner una tienda dedicada solo a la venta de flores, y siente que es el momento de empezar a crecer y tener un local propio. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete en seguir siendo una socia puntual y cumplida como en créditos anteriores que tuvo. Con los 1000 soles solicitados, comprará más flores para surtir mejor su negocio e  incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en: Nerith is a 52-year-old, very friendly, and hard-working woman who lives in her own home with her husband Jeremías, who is 53 years old, and their two beloved daughters: Adriana who is 20 and  Anaé who is 18 years old. She wants to offer her daughters a better quality of life. Neritha sells flowers on the outskirts of the city's cemetery. There she has a stand where she sells flowers and in small boxes arranges her roses, carnations, and violets. She works alone since with the passage of the years has learned how to give herself time to do almost everything. She likes her job a lot because she enjoys having conversations with other sellers and also likes to offer her flowers to different people who come to visit their family member's tombs and mausoleums. She has been doing this for 11 years and is doing very well however she still does not feel satisfied since she wants to have a store that sells only flowers and feels this is the moment to grow her business and have her own locale. This will be her second loan with an MFP and awaits their support to continue with our goals. She commits to continue being a punctual member as she was with her prior loans. She will use the 1000 Peruvian soldiers to buy more flowers and increase her sales.

loans.use: buy a variety of flowers.

loans.name: Recilita

texts.en:
Recilita is 34 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. Recilita has a furniture shop that sells furniture like dining tables and wooden chairs. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to buy wood and lumber needed for making furniture. Recilita has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.
In the future, Recilita hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy wood and lumber needed for making furniture

loans.name: Marta De La Cruz

texts.es: Maria de la Cruz es una emprendedora que se le brindo financiamiento para invertir en su negocio en la compra de productos para la pulpería, ella nos expresa que sus cliente de la comunidad donde ella habita estas satisfecho por la variedad de producto y su calidad de servicio. Actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para comprar más productos para la pulpería como granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, pan, galletas y detergentes.
texts.en:
Maria de la Cruz is an entrepreneur who has received financing to invest in her business through the purchase of products for her convenience store. She says that her clients in the community where she lives are satisfied with the variety of products offered and the quality of service she provides. 

Maria is currently seeking a new loan so that she can purchase more products for the shop such as grains, candy, soda, bread, biscuits and detergents.

loans.use: to purchase products such as grains, candy, soda, bread, biscuits and detergents.

loans.name: Batma

texts.ru:
Батме 57 лет, замужем, воспитала четверых детей.  В качестве дохода для своей семьи, Батма развивает животноводство и земледелие. 
Стартовав с суммы в 20,000 сом (KGS), Батма  смогла развить хозяйство, насчитывающее на сегодня две дойные коровы, десять овец и приносящее около 3,000 сом в месяц. Также, Батма обрабатывает 4 га орошаемой земли, где выращивает фасоль.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Батма обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Батма планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Batma is 57 years old, she is married and has raised four children. Batma does business in animal husbandry and farming as a source of income for her family.

Starting with the sum of 20,000 soms (KGS), Batma was able to develop her business which today has two milk cows, ten sheep, and bringing around 3,000 som per month. Also Batma processes 4 hectares of irrigated land where she grows beans.

In order to further develop her business Batma has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) to purchase additional livestock. Batma plans to invest the revenue in further increase of the headcount of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Virgen De Fátima Group

texts.es:
El comité Virgen De Fátima se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad Santaní. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
Cyntia es miembro del grupo, y ella nos cuenta que tiene una pequeña despensa bien surtida, nos dice que empezó siendo un pequeño local, pero hoy en día ya ha progresado considerablemente. Su meta es poder tener un local bien surtido donde ofrecer más variedad a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, azúcar, fideos, lacteos y demás artículos de primera necesidad, los cuales son los que más salida tienen. Ella al igual que sus compañeras están muy agradecidas por la oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
The communal bank 'Virgen de Fátima' was formed through the union of several neighbors in Santaní city. The members have formed a tightly knit group who are capable of working together and carrying out activities that strengthen their partnership.

Cynthia is a member of this group, and tells us that she owns a small but well-stocked food store. It began as a small shop but has since progressed considerably. Her goal is to have a well-stocked premises which offers more variety to her customers.

She seeks this loan to purchase rice, sugar, noodles, milk and other staples which are in high demand. Cynthia and her fellow members are very grateful for the opportunity they are receiving.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, noodles, milk and other staples.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita, de 53 años, es una mujer muy amble y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Elías de 58 años y sus 5 queridos hijos, a quienes educó y crió hasta que se hagan independientes, solo dos de ellos aún dependen de ella para su educación. El trabajo de Margarita es el alquiler de moto taxis, todos los días desde muy temprano por la mañana, llegan jóvenes conductores quienes desean alquilar uno de sus vehículos  para ganar un poco de dinero durante el día. Esta actividad le ha generado buenos ingresos, motivo por el cual desea continuar con éste negocio.  Recuerda que  cuando empezó y tenía solo una unidad y lo manejaba su esposo, pero con el tiempo fue creciendo y fue comprando más vehículos que ahora los alquila. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que ayuda a las personas a generarse un ingreso, además que le genera ingresos a su hogar. Lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y se siente muy cómoda ya que le permite tener tiempo para dedicarse a su familia y aportar con la economía de su hogar. Ahora su prioridad es ahorrar para comprarse un carro y empezar con el mismo sistema de trabajo. Este será el crédito número 8 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos, por su parte se compromete en ser puntual en sus cuotas y así no quedar mal con el grupo al que pertenece ya que todos son muy responsables y muy buenos.
Con los 3000 soles solicitados, comprará repuestos para su moto taxi, ya que por el continuo uso algunas piezas se han deteriorado.
texts.en: Margarita is a 53 year old, very friendly, and hard working woman who lives in her own home with her husband Elías, who is 58 years old, and their five beloved children. She raised them to become independent and only two of them still depend on her for their education. She rents moto taxis. Early morning every day young drivers come who want to rent one of her vehicles to make some money for the day. She has made lots of income which is why she continues with this job. She remembers when she began she only had one car and her husband drove it and as the time passed by they baought more cars and rented them. What she likes most about her job is that she helps people have an income and also has an income for herself. She has been doing this for two years and likes it says since allows her to have time for her family and provide them with financial support. Now her priority is to buy a new car and began with the same system. This will be her eighth loan with MFP and she is very happy in knowing that she will have a loan to accomplish her objectives. She commits herself to be punctual with the payments because she does not want to let the group down since everyone is responsible and goodhearted. The 3000 Peruvian loan will be used to buy moto taxi parts since the one she had is beginning to fall apart.

loans.use: Comprar repuestos para su moto taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a water tank for her home restaurant

loans.name: Moises Elias

texts.es:
Moisés, vive con su esposa y su hijo de tres años, la casa es familiar, él se dedica a la venta de productos medicinales, este negocio tiene 6 años de estarlo administrando, ha iniciado con poco productos pero ha ganado ya varios clientes.
Actualmente Moisés solicita un préstamo para pagar un pedido de medicamentos que ha realizado, en el cual vienen incluido medicinas curativas, vitaminas, tratamientos alimenticios, esta compra le ayudara para mantener en su negocio lo necesario para atender las demandas de los clientes. 
La aspiración de Moisés es que el negocio prospere, crecer en sus ventas y la atención en los clientes.
texts.en:
Moses lives with his wife and three year-old son in their own home.  He sells medicinal products, a business he has managed for the past 6 years. He started with just a few products but has already earned several clients.
Moses is currently applying for a loan to pay for a medication order that he has made. Included in this order are curative medicines, vitamins and dietary treatments. This purchase will help to keep his business and is necessary to meet customer demands.
Moses’ aspiration is for his business to thrive, grow his sales and service his clients.

loans.use: to buy curative medicines, vitamins and dietary treatments.

loans.name: Lourdes Yaneth

texts.es:
Lourdes, es empleada y administra un ciber, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, su trabajo es como profesora desde hace 16 años y el negocio tiene 5 años de administrarlo.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de divisiones para el ciber, ventiladores y actualizar sus computadoras, con el dinero de este préstamo estará mejorando el ambiente dentro del ciber, para que sus clientes se sientan mas cómodos.
La aspiración de Lourdes es ir modificando poco a poco la estructura del ciber, adquiriendo nuevos equipos para aumentar la capacidad.
texts.en: Lourdes is employed and runs a internet cafe. She lives with her husband and two children. She has worked as a teacher for 16 years and managed her business for five. She is asking for a loan to buy dividers, fans, and to update the computers. The money from the loan will improve the internet cafe's ambiance and make the customers feel more comfortable. Lourdes's inspiration is to modify the structure of the cafe bit by bit, acquiring new equipment to increase capacity.

loans.use: to buy dividers, fans, and to update computers.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 43 años, convive con Alejandro, con quien tiene 3 hijos, pero solo viven con 2 de ellos: Denis, de 19 y Adeliz, de 18 años. Esta familia habita en una casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay, distrito de Huasahuasi. Hace 32 años que Rosa, se dedica al trabajo del campo, produciendo papas, arvejas y maíz. Gracias a los suelos de su zona las ventas no tiene pierde. Además de ser su principal fuente de ingresos, la agricultura le trae momentos de alegrías junto a su familia, ya que juntos se dirigen los fines de semana a limpiar, abonar y cosechar sus cultivos. Las dificultades también surgen en el campo, pero con sus años dedicándose a esa actividad ya sabe como contrarrestar.  A la vez cuenta con una bodega instalada en su casa, donde vende productos de primera necesidad, ya es conocida entre todo los pobladores del caserío, pues ofrece una variedad de productos necesarios. 
Ahora piensa iniciar otro cultivo de arvejas, ya que los meses de enero y febrero son cruciales para una buena siembra. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de Cumutay” y este sería su crédito número 10 con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para concretar sus planes. Además le gusta el trabajo de su banco comunal por ello se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas puntualmente.
De recibir el dinero del préstamo invertirá en la compra de 4 bolsas de semilla de arveja y varios sacos de abono orgánico para empezar con éxito su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
43-year-old Rosa lives with her life partner Alexander. They have three children but only two live with them -  Denis, 19, and Adeliza, 18. The family lives in their own house, located in the hamlet of Cumutay, in Huasahuasi district. 

For 32 years Rosa has been farming and producing potatoes, peas and corn. Thanks to the good soil in her area, her sales have not fallen. Aside from being the main source of income, agriculture brings moments of joy to her family as they spend the weekends together clearing, fertilizing and harvesting their crops. Difficulties also arise in the fields, but Rosa knows how to deal with them thanks to her many years spent working in this industry. 

Rosa also has a small grocery store installed in her home, which is well known amongst the locals in her neighborhood. Here she offers a good variety of staple products and necessities.  

Rosa is now planning to start another crop of peas, as the months of January and February are crucial for producing a good crop. She belongs to the communal bank 'Pioneros de Cumutay' (Cumutay Pioneers) and this will be her 10th loan with MFP. She hopes for their collaboration to help her finalize her plans. She enjoys working with her communal bank and therefore agrees to comply with the timely payment of her dues.

She will invest this loan in the purchase of four bags of pea seeds and several sacks of organic fertilizer so that she can successfully begin her next planting.

loans.use: to purchase four bags of pea seeds and several sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 33-year-old married man and father of four gorgeous children. He works hard to provide them with the best living ever.

Ali is a hardworking man. He has worked in construction since he was 11 years old. He was too young when first started working. He was forced to start working early because of his parent's miserable financial situation and he had to help as much as he could to make their living.

Ali puts so much effort in improving his work and it's all to avoid his children living his miserable childhood, which he prefers not to remember anymore.
Now he is living both his childhood and his parenthood at the same time with his children. He's both the friend & the father.

To improve his business, Ali is increasing the number of iron pillars necessary for his business, since he's specialized in painting houses, and these pillars are necessary for the outside part of the buildings and houses. They can help him take bigger projects than he's taking now. To increase the number of irons pillars, Ali applied for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua. He hopes this loan will improve his business more and more to keep on providing his family the best living ever.

loans.use: To buy iron plllars for his painting business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to register himself as a contractor

loans.name: Rakibjon

texts.ru: Ракибчон проживает в городе Истаравшан. Возраст, 36 лет. У него пятеро детей. Ракибчон предоставляет услугу на своем грузом автомобиле. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 10 лет. Кроме того он занимается растениеводством. Кредит берет для ремонта своей машины и покупки минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Rakibjon lives in the town of Istaravshan. He is 36 years old. He has five children. Rakibjon provides a service on his truck. He has been in this business for ten years. He also cultivates crops. He is taking out the loan to repair his truck and to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.use: to repair his truck and to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw materials for jewelry shop

loans.name: Adel

texts.en:
Adel is a 54-year-old married man, the father of three children. He opened a grocery store 12 years ago and his store is well known in the region. But competition is becoming strong so that's why he has to be ready to remain in front of them. Adel is applying for a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, in order to increase his business capital through increasing his grocery merchandise.

This is Adel's first cycle as an Al Majmoua borrower, and he hopes it will reflect positively on both his social and financial situations. Adel is a loving father; he works hard to provide his children with the best. He hopes that he will be capable of educating them to see them in good positions in the future. He hopes to improve and expand his shop in the future as much as he can with the help of future loans.

loans.use: To increase his grocery merchandise

loans.name: Los Palmares 1, 2, & 3 Group

texts.en:
Monica is the coordinator of her group Los Palmares 1, 2 & 3 (The Palms). Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo and is composed of 15 businesspeople. Monica and the 14 other group members are taking loans for their businesses.
Monica requires a loan to buy fabric, thread and haberdashery items to make blankets, bedding sets and curtains. This is Monica's third loan with Esperanza International. She will take a step toward improving her business by investing this loan to increase her services and sales.
Monica has run her business for almost ten years. She lives in a simple home with her three children. She is a hardworking single mother working to provide for her family. Her most difficult challenge has been raising her children. 
Monica enjoys taking care of her children. She says that her favorite thing is to sew. She will save her profits because she wants to fulfill her dream by buying a plot of land to build a house. Monica and her group are thankful for your support.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, etc.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 35 years old, married and has seven children, five of whom are in school. 
Alma is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. Alma has been farming rice for four years now, and has taken 11 loans in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.
In the future, Alma would like to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Madougou

texts.fr:
Madougou est une veuve de 63 ans, qui réside avec sa coépouse et leurs enfants chez leur defunt époux, à Mancourani II, le centre ville de Sikasso (troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
N’ayant pas eu la chance d’avancer à l’école pour des raisons sociales, cette femme s’est initiée à l’activité de petit commerce d’achat-vente de pagnes wax et des tissus brodés, depuis plus de trente  ans. Elle est beaucoup sollicitée surtout de sa clientèle, composée essentiellement des femmes, pour la qualité de ses produits. Elle reçoit beaucoup de commandes des localités environnantes et son activité marche à merveille.
Dans le souci de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, elle décida d’intégrer l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso depuis plus de sept ans. Après plusieurs prêts solidaires (prêt du groupe) dans une association des femmes de son quartier, il est à son douzième prêt individuel, tous ses prêts précédents ont été correctement remboursés.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Elle compte acheter avec ce prêt 40 pièces de pagne wax, 20 complets de tissus brodés. Elle s’approvisionne à Bamako ensuite elle les revend de façon ambulante à Sikasso et souvent dans les localités environnantes de Sikasso.
Elle envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 200 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé essentiellement pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, contribuer aux dépenses familiales et payer les intérêts de son prêt.
texts.en:
Madougou, age 63, is a widow who lives with her co-spouse and their children at the home of their late husband in Mancourani II, in the center of Sikasso (Third Administrative Region of the Republic of Mali).

Never having had the opportunity to progress in school due to social issues, she became familiar with the business of trading "pagnes Wax" (colorful African cloth) and embroidered fabrics thirty years ago.

She's very much in demand by her clientele, which comprises mostly women, thanks to the quality of her products. She gets lots of orders from neighboring villages, and her business is doing very well.

Eager to better satisfy her ever-increasing clientele, she decided to join Kiva's partner, the MFI Soro Yiriwaso, seven years ago. After several solidarity loans (group loans) with an association of women of her neighborhood, she's now seeking her twelfth individual loan. All previous loans were repaid without problems.

She intends to use this loan to buy 40 pieces of pagnes Wax, and 20 pieces of embroidered fabrics. She gets her supplies in Bamako, and resell her products as a traveling saleswoman in Sikasso, and often in the neighboring villages.

She intends to turn an average monthly profit of XOF 200'000 (ca US$ 390), to be used mainly to increase her working capital, help with the family expenses, and repay the interests of the loan.

loans.use: to buy 40 pieces of pagnes Wax (colorful African cloth) and 20 pieces of embroidered fabrics

loans.name: Andresita

texts.en:
Andresita is 52 years old and married with three children, all of whom currently go to school. She works very hard to provide for them.
Andresita runs a live lobster retail business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for ten years. She has requested a loan of 29,500 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to purchase more lobster to sell. 
In the future, Andresita would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more lobster to sell.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is 54 years old and married with six children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a loan of 16,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.
Corazon has borrowed and paid back nine loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from farming rice.
Corazon aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en:
Emelia is a widow who works hard to support her family. She runs a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines.
Emelia has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle. She has been in this business for ten years now.
In the future, Emelia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for her motorcycle.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 37 years old and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. 
Marilou runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.
Marilou has borrowed and paid back 31 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years and also earns an income from farming rice.
Marilou aspires to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Moussa

texts.fr:
Né en Octobre 1983 à Sikasso, Monsieur Moussa est un célibataire qui réside dans une grande famille traditionnelle à Mancourani II, un des  quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso ( troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Moussa s’est initié à cette activité d’achat et  de vente de poissons frais en provenance de Dakar il y a environ trois ans. Son activité est menée dans une boutique sur la route RN7 en face de la Gendarmerie  de Sikasso avec une clientèle composée de toutes les couches sociales. Il est beaucoup sollicitée de sa clientèle pour la qualité de ses poissons frais. 
Dans le souci de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, Il décide d’intégrer l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso il y a environ quelque mois.. 
Dans le but de mieux relancer cette activité, il sollicite ainsi son premier crédit qui lui permettra d’acheter 30 cartons de poissons frais avant de les revendre en détail  aux consommateurs de Sikasso. 
 Il envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 150 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé essentiellement pour augmenter son fonds de commerce et payer les intérêts de son prêt.
texts.en:
Moussa, who was born in 1983 in Sikasso, is single and lives in a large traditional family in Mancourani II, one of the working-class districts of the town of Sikasso (the Republic of Mali's third administrative region). He began buying and selling fresh fish from Dakar around three years ago, and he carries out his business in a shop on the RN7 highway opposite the police station in Sikasso; his customers come from all social backgrounds. He is in great demand from his customers for the quality of his fresh fish.

With a view to responding better to ever-increasing customer demand, he decided to join the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, several months ago. He is requesting a first loan so that he can boost his business and buy 30 cartons of fresh fish to resell on a retail basis to Sikasso consumers.

With this loan he expects to make a monthly profit of 150,000FCFA, which will be used principally to expand his business and repay the interest on his loan.

loans.use: to buy fresh fish

loans.name: Kerana

texts.en:
Kerana is 53 years old, married and has one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 
Kerana has a fruits and eggs business in the Philippines. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell.
Kerana has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of fruit and eggs.

loans.name: Chauv

texts.en:
Mrs. Chauv has been operating a small sales business from her home. In the morning she sells fish porridge to local people in the community. She also sells biscuits, sweet things and packaged food, especially for young children. From this business, she is able to generate income of $1.50 per day. At present, Chauv has two young children who are under her care. 
Chauv would like to take out a loan from Kiva partner HKL to purchase a small piece of land next to her present house. Her future goal is to own a proper store for selling different types of products.

loans.use: to purchase a small piece of land next to her present house.

loans.name: Narantuya

texts.en: Mrs. Narantuya, 26, has worked as a technician in a food factory in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia, for over six years. She is a young mother who lives with her family in a house in an industrial district of Ulaanbaatar. She has been living in this house since she was a child. For the most part, the house has been become very old and damaged. Therefore Narantuya is planning to make some repairs and renovation to the house before this winter. She will use the loan to purchase the necessary building materials for the renovations.

loans.use: to purchase building materials to renovate her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of items

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael con su anterior credikiva anterior, compró mercancía que vendió y también le alcanzó para invertir en materia prima e insumos para confeccionar ropa de todo tipo, con la que también le fue muy bien. Su negocio ha mejorado mucho, adquirió dos máquinas recientemente y sus ventas se han incrementado. En la actualidad Rafael quiere aprovechar la época de diciembre, donde sus ventas se incrementan y la rotación de sus productos es de contado,para elaborar nuevos diseños. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, con el cual comprará tela e insumos de confección, para vestir alegremente a las familias en las festividades de año nuevo . Rafael dijo a su asesor: Gracias, me han ayudado mucho a mí y a muchas personas que se benefician con los créditos de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. "
texts.en: Rafael used his previous Credikiva loan to buy merchandise which he then sold, and also to invest in materials and supplies to make all kinds of clothing, which was very helpful.  Recently he has bought two machines and sales have increased.  Currently Rafael wants to take advantage of the December season when sales increase and there is greater turnover of his products, so he can come up with new designs.  This is why he is requesting a new loan to buy fabric and sewing supplies.  In this way he will be able to dress the families in a festive mode for the New Year's celebrations.  Rafael said to his counselor, "Thank you for helping me and many other people who benefit from the loans given through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.".

loans.use: To buy fabric and sewing suupplies.

loans.name: Chiep

texts.en:
Mr. Chiep is 49 years old and the loving father of seven children. He is a humble farmer who lives in Kompong Cham province. He is a very hardworking man who grows rice crops both in rainy season and in dry season.
To increase his household income, Chiep has bought some types of fish to raise in a pond next to his house in addition to managing his daily farming tasks. In order to sustain his two businesses, Chiep needs some capital to buy fish feed and to pay for the process of cultivating his dry-season rice. This is his first loan from HKL and Kiva. Chiep hopes that he’ll be able to make a good income and improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fish feed and to pay for the cultivation of his dry-season rice.

loans.name: Mani

texts.fr:
Madame Mani est âgée de 54 ans, mariée et mère de 6 enfants. Elle  réside avec son époux et leurs enfants dans une famille nucléaire à Hamdallaye, un des  quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso .              
Madame Mani après avoir mené beaucoup d’activités sans succès, s’est initiée à cette activité génératrice de revenus notamment à l’achat et à la vente des pagnes wax, et des articles en plastiques (Seaux, Bol, Gobelet, Assiette etc) depuis plus de trois ans. Elle achète ses marchandises à Bobo (Burkina Faso), avant de les revendre de façon ambulantes dans son quartier, au grand marché et au marché de Médine à une clientèle composée essentiellement des femmes de ménage. 
Pour satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, elle décida ainsi de rejoindre l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso depuis plus d’un an. Elle est à son deuxième prêt individuel, le prêt précédent a été correctement remboursé.
Ce deuxième prêt individuel lui permettra d’acheter 10 pièces de pagnes wax, 2 douzaines de baignoires  et  5 douzaines de seaux.
 Elle envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 95 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, contribuer aux dépenses familiales et payer les intérêts de son prêt.
texts.en: Mani is 54 years old, married, and the mother of six children.  She lives with her husband and children in a nuclear family in Hamdallaye, one of the working-class neighborhoods of the city of Sikasso.  After being involved in many activities without much success, Mani decided to learn a new profitable trade, that of buying and selling wax-print "pagnes" (colorful West African fabrics) and plastic items (buckets, bowls, cups, plates etc.)  She has been involved in this business for over three years.  She buys her goods in Bobo (Burkina Faso) and sells them door-to-door in her neighborhood, at the Grand Marché and the marché in Médine.  Her customers are mostly cleaning ladies.  In order to satisfy an ever-increasing number of customers, she decided to join the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso over a year ago.  She has requested a second individual loan.  Her first loan was well repaid.  This new individual loan will allow her to buy 10 sets of wax-print "pagnes", 2 dozen tubs and 5 dozen buckets.  With this loan, she is expecting monthly profits to reach 95,000 CFA francs, which will be used to boost her business, contribute to family expenses and pay off her loan's interests.

loans.use: to buy wax-print "pagnes" and plastic items.

loans.name: Heiber Arley

texts.es: El señor Heiber Arley a sus 26 años de edad es un emprendedor quien desea iniciar su propio negocio de venta de comidas rápidas a las afueras de su casa en un carro adecuado para la elaboración y venta de este tipo de alimentos con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos puesto que con el trabajo que tiene actualmente en una empresa de carga en el aeropuerto del municipio de Rionegro localizado al oriente de Antioquia no es suficiente para cubrir los gastos y necesidades en su hogar, para lo cual el señor Heiber Arley necesita de la compra del carro para la venta de sus productos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Heiber Arley, 26, is an entrepreneur who wants to set up his own fast food business outside his house.  He would use a vehicle as a food stall to make and sell the food and, thus, improve his income.  The current job he has with a cargo company at the Rionegro municipal airport in east Antioquia does not provide enough income to cover household expenses and necessities.  

Heiber Arley needs to buy a vehicle to sell his products so he can improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy a vehicle to start up a fast food business.

loans.name: Luís Iban

texts.es:
El señor Luís tiene 32 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y un hijo.

Luís se ha dedicado a desempeñar las actividades agrícolas, y desde hace dos años esta trabajando en el cultivo de hortalizas, trabajo que aprendió de su papá. Luis es una persona muy trabajadora, honesta y responsable. Él necesita abastecer el mercado de una comunidad, ya que tiene muchos clientes a los que les vende tomates, maíz, fríjol, chile, pepino, entre otros.

Los insumos como fertilizantes, semillas, fungicidas, insecticidas, los compra en una ciudad que esta a siete kilómetros del lugar donde vive. Debido a que Luís necesita abastecer el mercado, él solicita un préstamo a la Fundación Campo para comprar, semillas de maíz, fríjol, tomate, pepino, insecticidas, fungicidas y pago de mano de obra, para cultivar 10,500 metros cuadrados de tierra. Así él obtendrá más ganancias, porque aumentara el número de clientes y le permitirá ahorrar, darle una mejor vida a su familia y dentro de poco tiempo solicitar un préstamo con un monto mayor para aumentar la cantidad de tierra para cultivar más.

Don Luís desea ampliar su vivienda, tener una pecera, una granja de pollos de engorde y de gallinas ponedoras.
texts.en:
Luís is 32 and lives with his common-law wife and son.

He works in agriculture and for the last two years has been growing vegetables, a trade he learned from his father.  Luis is hard-working, honest and responsible.  He supplies to the community market and has many customers who buy his tomatoes, corn, beans, chili peppers, cucumbers and other produce.

He buys the supplies he needs such as fertilizer, seeds, fungicides, and insecticides in the city which is seven kilometers from where he lives.  In order to continue selling crops at the market he is requesting a loan through Fundación Campo to buy corn, bean, tomato and cucumber seeds, insecticides and fungicides, and hire workers to plant 10,500 square meters of land.  He will be able to make more money this way since he will increase his customer base and be able to save and give his family a better lifestyle.  In the near future he wants to ask for a more significant loan to increase his cropland.

Luís wants to expand his house, adding a fish pond, and a farm to raise chickens and hens.

loans.use: To buy corn, bean, tomato, and cucumber seeds; insecticides; fungicides: and hire workers to plant 10,000 square meters of land.

loans.name: Lundaajantsan

texts.en: Mr. Lundaajantsan, 55, runs a second-hand clothes stall selling garments that have been imported from developing countries. He lives in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia, with his wife and his son. Lundaajantsan has been running his business for seven years and already has many permanent customers. Now he feels it is time to increase his working capital to expand his sales volume in order to improve and increase his earnings. The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase second-hand clothes from his suppliers in large amounts.

loans.use: to purchase second-hand clothes in bulk.

loans.name: Ismaël

texts.fr:
Né en Août 1984 à Sikasso, Monsieur Ismaël est un célibataire qui réside dans une grande famille traditionnelle à Médine, un des  quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso ( troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Ismaël ayant pas eu la chance de progresser dans les études s’est initié à cette activité d’achat et vente des pots de fleurs et ustensiles de cuisines, il y a environ sept ans. Son activité est menée dans une boutique au nouveaux marché de Médine Sikasso avec une clientèle composée de toutes les couches sociales. Il est beaucoup sollicitée de sa clientèle pour la qualité de ses produits. 
Dans le souci de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, Il décida d’intégrer l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso il y a environ une année. Il a bénéficié d’un crédit qui a été correctement remboursé. 
Dans le but de mieux relancer toujours ses activités, il sollicite ainsi un deuxième crédit qui lui permettra d’acheter à Bamako 20 cartons de pots de fleurs de marques différentes, 3 cartons de tasses Aluminium, 5 cartons d’assiettes, 2 douzaines de cuillères et 2 douzaines de fourchettes. 
 Il envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 200 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour contribuer aux dépenses familiales, payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en: Ismaël was born in August 1984 in Sikasso.  He is single and lives in a large traditional family in Médine, one of the working-class neighborhoods of the city of Sikasso (third administrative district of the Republic of Mali).  Ismaël did not get the chance to progress in his studies, and about seven years ago, he learned how to get involved in the business of buying and selling flower pots and kitchen utensils.  He sells these items in a shop located in the new market of Médine, in Sikasso.  His customers come from all socioeconomic groups.  He is a very popular seller, thanks to the quality of his products.  In order to better satisfy an ever-increasing number of customers, he decided to join the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso about a year ago.  He was granted a loan which was properly repaid.  In order to further enhance his business, he is requesting a second loan which will allow him to buy 20 boxes of flower pots (of various brands), 3 boxes of aluminum cups, 5 boxes of plates, 2 dozen spoons and 2 dozen forks.  He will buy these items in Bamako.  He is expecting monthly profits to reach 200,000 CFA francs, part of which will be used to contribute to his family's expenses, pay off his loan's interests, while the rest will be invested in his business.

loans.use: to buy various retail items.

loans.name: Nandintsetseg

texts.en: Mrs. Nandintsetseg, 31, is a secondary school teacher in Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. She has been teaching in the school for five years and lives with her family in a common apartment. Nandintsetseg wants to make renovations to the apartment because it is old and needs window insulation. During the winter time there is too much heat loss through the broken windows. Therefore she is requesting a loan to purchase the building materials to make repairs.

loans.use: to purchase building materials to make some repairs to her apartment.

loans.name: Oyunbold

texts.en:
Mr. Oyunbold is a 39-year-old married man and father of two beautiful daughters. He lives in an outer ger district of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia, without  basic infrastructure. His elder daughter is a student in a local university while his five-year-old daughter stays at home with her mother. 
Oyunbold's family has operated a small sewing factory for 12 years. They sew a variety of clothes, which they sell at the largest outdoor market in Mongolia. The family business has improved day by day, and therefore Oyunbold wants a car to support the business. He is requesting a loan of 2,400,000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) to buy a new car.

loans.use: to buy a new car to support his business.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Annabelle is 29 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child. 
Annabelle has a retail shop that sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has run this business for five years. She has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages for resale.
Annabelle has been a member of Kiva partner HSPFI since 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy snacks, canned goods and beverages.

loans.name: Boanerges Arcides

texts.es:
Boanerges, vive con su madre, está soltero, no tiene hijos, la casa es familiar, él se dedica a administrar un restaurante, lleva 10 años en el negocio, inicio como empleado y poco a poco se fue posesionando hasta que hoy lo administra.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de alimentos como: carnes, pollo, aceite, condimentos, verduras, y otros que son necesarios para estar preparado para atender la demanda de los clientes.
Su aspiración es mantener siempre la fidelidad de los clientes, por eso invierte en mejoras pues le ayuda a crecer y estabilizarse.
texts.en:
Boanerges lives with his mother.  He is single, with no children, and lives in the family home.  For ten years he has been in the restaurant business.  He began as a restaurant worker and little by little became skilled enough to run a business.

Currently he is requesting a loan to buy food ingredients such as meats, chicken, oil, condiments, vegetables and other items he must have on hand to be able to meet customer demand.
