Asdrubal is a member of the Bancruce Communal Credit Company, one of the 150 partner organizations of the microfinance institution EDESA in Costa Rica. As a member he was granted a microloan that enabled him to grow as a small business owner.

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: El señor Ernesto es un hombre muy trabajador, que desde hace 8 años tiene un taxi que el mismo maneja, con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo compro su propia concesión y el automóvil, para no seguir pagando renta ya que no lo permitía tener muchas ganancias solo para lo suficiente para subsistir. Ahora cómo ve que le va muy bien en su negocio y esta prosperando quiere comprar otro automóvil para ponerlo como taxi y contratar un chofer para que se encargue, de esta manera obtendrá mayores ganancias.
texts.en: Ernesto is a very hardworking man who has run a taxi service for 8 years.  With much effort and hard work he managed to purchase his own car so that he wouldn’t have to keep paying to rent one, since renting a car was preventing him from earning much profit beyond what he needed to survive.  Now things are going very well in his business and it is thriving, and so Ernesto wants to purchase another car to use as a taxi and hire a driver who will be in charge of it.  This will allow Ernesto to increase his earnings.

loans.use: to purchase a car to use as a taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabrics and thread, since she needs to increase her production because she has a full order book.

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es:
Hugo es un joven de 24 años de edad, el cual vive con su esposa e hijos, en una comunidad llamada el Upala de San Carlos, en la provincia de Alajuela. En Alajuela existen cinco parques nacionales, una reserva nacional de fauna silvestre, cinco zonas protectoras y varias reservas forestales. También en la provincia se ubica el Museo Juan Santamaría, el cual exhibe artesanías producidas localmente. Esta zona ocupa el primer lugar nacional en la producción de café y azúcar de caña.

Desde hace doce años que Hugo se dedica a la ganadería, ya que cuenta en estos momentos con el propiedad, pero le falta lo principal para que su negocio surja y para que los vecinos de su comunidad se vean beneficiados. 

Actualmente Hugo está solicitando un micro crédito de ¢500.000 (quinientos mil colones) para la compra de dos vacas. Con esto el espera hacer crecer su negocio y mejorar tanto su calidad de vida como la de su familia. 

Hugo es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Delirio, una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su primer préstamo y con él espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Hugo, aged 24, is a young man living with his wife and children in a community called Upala de San Carlos in the province of Alajuela. This province has five natural parks, one wild fauna nature reserve, five protected zones and a few forest reserves. In addition, the province hosts the Juan Santamaría Museum that exhibits local traditional craftwork. The area is the main coffee and cane sugar producer of Costa Rica.

Hugo has been working for twelve years in animal breeding. Right now he owns the premises, but lacks capital to develop his business and have his community benefit from his activity.

He applies now for a microloan of 500,000 colones to buy two cows. He expects that this loan will help his business grow and improve the quality of life of himself and his family.

Hugo is a member of the Delirio Communal Credit Company, one of the 150 partner organizations of the microfinance institution EDESA in Costa Rica. This will be his first loan and he expects that it will help him grow both personally and economically. He wants to be an active partner in the credit organization of his community.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is an entrepreneur from Trinidad, Bohol. She is engaged in fishing. Zenaida hires workers to operate her fishing boat to catch fish. She sells the fish at her town's market. 

Zenaida is single and supports her family and nieces and nephews.

Zenaida has requested this loan to buy fishing nets, floaters, and crab nets. She hopes for her business to prosper.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, floaters, and crab nets.

loans.name: Baigane

texts.fr: Monsieur Baigane est un célibataire  âgé de 27 ans  qui vit au Sénégal. Il est maçon depuis plus de 10 ans. Aussi parallèlement   il exerce l’activité d’aviculteur  ou il capitalise une expérience d’un an. Il a choisi ses occupations par passion mais aussi dans le souci de se procurer des revenus afin de subvenir à ses besoins  personnels ainsi qu’a ceux de ses parents. Il est plutôt intéressé  par l’aspect lucratif de sa deuxième activité. Il  est sociétaire dans un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis octobre 2009. Il emprunte 400 000 frs dans le souci de s’approvisionner  en poulets pour son projet avicole et en aliment de poussins. Avec son opération  il espère accroitre ses bénéfices  et améliorer les conditions de vie de ses parents.
texts.en:
Mr. Baigane is a 27-year-old unmarried man who lives in Senegal. He has been a mason for over ten years. Concurrently, he also raises poultry and capitalizes on a year of experience. He chose these occupations for the love of them but also out of concern for acquiring income to support himself, as well as his parents. He is rather interested by the lucrative aspect of his second business. 

Mr. Baigane has been an associate in one of the U-IMCEC branch offices since October 2009. He is borrowing 400,000 francs for stocking up on chickens and for his poultry and feed project. 

With his operations, he hopes to grow his profits and to improve his parents’ living conditions.

loans.use: to buy hens and feed for chicks

loans.name: Gloria Maria

texts.es: Gloria Maria tiene 24 años, la actividad económica a la que se dedica es la venta de mercadería en general ya tiene años de experiencia en el negocio en el cual sus clientes la buscan por el servicio y la calidad de productos que le ofrece. Gloria es una emprendedora que ha luchado por tener su propio negocio y ofrecerle a sus clientes variedad de producto, ella está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de variedad de mercadería en general.
texts.en: Gloria María is 24 years old. She sells general merchandise and has several years of experience in this business. Her customers appreciate her because of the service and the high quality of her goods. Gloria is an entrepreneur who has struggled to keep her own business and provide a diversified offer to her customers. Now she applies for this loan to buy a variety of general merchandise.

loans.use: to buy a variety of general merchandise.

loans.name: Donatila Paulina

texts.es:
Donatila tiene 43 años , es muy trabajadora y empeñosa tiene un hijo, el cual ya tiene 22 años y quien la apoya en el negocio; Donatila vive en la ciudad de ica , la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido en cualquier época del año, asi como también por la Laguna de Huacachina; considerada como el oasis de América; Donatila solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria debido a los pocos recursos que tenían sus padres, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar para ser profesora de educación inicial; como buena peruana Donatila ama nuestra comida, pero uno de los platillos que más le gusta es el riquísimo arroz con pollo.

Donatila tiene su negocio de cochera para mototaxis, le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 4 horas al día, llegando a atender hasta 10 clientes diarios; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque brinda seguridad a sus clientes ya que en la ciudad no hay muchas cocheras y las personas no tienen donde guardar sus mototaxis.

Donatila está muy alegre y agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá mejorar su cochera construyendo las paredes de cemento, con ello su cochera tendrá mayor seguridad y los clientes tendrán más confianza en dejar sus mototaxis y tendrá mayores ingresos para poder ahorrar y poder cumplir su más grande sueño:”Tener su propio Restaurant”.
texts.en:
Donatila is a hardworking, persevering 43 year old woman.  Her son is 22 years old already and helps her with the business.  Donatila lives in the city of Ica, which is characterized by a warm climate all year round and is also known for “La Laguna de Huacachina”, which is considered the oasis of America.  Donatila only completed the fifth year of secondary school as her parents had little resources.  However, she had wanted to study early childhood education and become a teacher.  As a good Peruvian, Donatila loves our food.  One of her favorite dishes is the delicious chicken with rice.

Donatila owns a garage for motor-cycle taxis.  She works at her business four hours a day; the number of customers she attends reaches up to 10 per day.  She feels her business is going well because she offers security to her customers.  There aren’t many garages in the city and people don’t have anywhere to keep their motor-cycle taxis.

Donatila is very happy and she is grateful for the Kiva loans.  Thanks to their support, she will be able to improve her garage by building cement walls.  With this improvement, her garage will have better security and her customers will feel more comfortable leaving their motor-cycle taxis.  Then, she will have higher income and be able to save and fulfill her greatest dream: “To have her own restaurant”.

loans.use: to build garage walls.

loans.name: Juana Benita

texts.es:
Juana tiene 34 años de edad, ella vive en la ciudad de chincha,  ciudad conocida por su población de origen afroperuano, por sus danzas y es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, por sus hermosas playas y por la producción de nuestro producto Bandera el “Pisco”, también esta ciudad es muy conocida por su comida ya que los pobladores de esa ciudad se les conoce por la buena sazón que tienen, uno de los platos favoritos de Juana es el riquísimo arroz con pato, Juana estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres.

Juana se dedica a la venta de zapatos y ropa, es muy luchadora y sobre todo responsable, ella se levanta desde muy temprano para poder hacer sus quehaceres del hogar temprano y irse a trabajar, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 15 clientes en el dia, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy constante, por la calidad de sus productos y porque brinda facilidades de pago a sus clientes.

Juana está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería, en especial productos de temporada de verano, con ello mejorara su negocio ya que tendrá mas variedad de productos para ofrecer y podrá tener más ingresos para seguir ahorrando y poder cumplir su mas grande sueño:” Ser una empresaria Exitosa”.
texts.en:
Juana is 34 years old and lives in the city of Chincha.  This city is known for its Afro-Peruvian population, for its dances, and because it is the birthplace of some great Peruvian sportspeople.  It is also known for its beautiful beaches and for its production of our country's flagship product (Pisco).  It is well known for its food.  The locals are known for the good food that they make.  One of Juana's favorite dishes is delicious duck and rice.  Juana only studied up to the fifth year of her secondary education owing to the limited financial resources of her parents.

Juana's business is selling shoes and clothing.  She is a very tenacious and responsible woman.  She gets up very early in the morning to do her housework and then goes out to work.  She works around 8 hours a day and can serve up to 15 customers.  She believes that her business is doing well because she is very persevering, her products are very good quality and she provides credit facilities to her customers.

Juana is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their support, she will be able to buy more merchandise, especially summer products.  This will allow her to improve her business as she will have a wider variety of products to offer her customers.  She will be able to make more income, which will allow her to continue saving and achieve her biggest dream of "becoming a successful businesswoman".

loans.use: to buy merchandise (footwear and clothing)

loans.name: Mbarani

texts.en:
Mbarani is a 37-year-old man from Vihiga town, Western Kenya. He is married to Joyce and they have four children, ages 5-12 years.

Mbarani operates a motorcycle transport business in Vihiga town. He has had this business for the last ten years, making a monthly income of KES 13,900. He is a long-time client of KADET LTD. He is taking his fifth loan, which he will use to buy another motorcycle. He will use his profits to educate his children.

His dream is to sustain his family and also provide their basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase another motorbike.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan Carlos tiene 35 años de edad, su actividad económica a la que dedica es la vulcanización lo cual ya tiene años de experiencia en el negocio, junto a él trabaja su hijo mayor que se encuentra a su cargo todavía. Juan Carlos es un emprendedor que  toda la vida  ha luchado por tener sus propio negocio y generar ingresos para la familia y sacarlos adelantes a todos. Juan Carlos está solicitando crédito para comprar materia prima para invertir en el  negocio y poder brindarles a sus clientes un excelente servicio.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 35. He has a tire repair business, and already has years of experience in the business. His eldest son, for whom he is still responsible,   works with him.

Juan Carlos is an entrepreneur who has struggled all his life to have his own business, to generate income for his family, and to help everyone get ahead in life. 

Juan Carlos is applying for a loan to buy raw material for his business, in order to provide his customers with excellent service.

loans.use: To buy raw material for his tire repair business.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia continua trabajando vendiendo frutas, 

nuestra socia es natural de la provincia de Sicuani, ubicada a 3 horas de la ciudad del Cusco, nuestra socia alterna el cuidado de sus hijos y otras responsabilidades del hogar con el comercio de frutas al por menor, ella solicita el préstamo debido a que deberá incrementar su negocio y comprar al por mayor frutas de los proveedores.
texts.en:
Felicitas continues to sell fruit for a living.

Felicitas comes from the province of Sicuani, located about 3 hours from the city of Cusco.  She manages to balance caring for her children and other household responsibilities with her fruit-selling business.  She is asking for a loan so she can increase her business and purchase fruit from wholesale suppliers.

loans.use: to purchase fruit to sell.

loans.name: Hilda Del Carmen

texts.es:
Hilda, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, con la intención de tener mayores ingresos en la temporada de diciembre, éstos préstamos de ayuda a tener disponibilidad económica para hacer compras periódicas de mariscos frescos, en este caso comprará mariscos, jugos, gaseosas, para diversificar su negocio.
Ella considera que sus ventas han aumentado con el nuevo inventario, ya que tiene  surtido el negocio con la ayuda del préstamo anterior.
texts.en: Hilda has decided to apply for a new loan in order to have higher income during the December season.  These loans help her to have the financial resources available to make periodic purchases of fresh seafood.  With this loan, she will buy seafood, juice, and soft drinks to diversify her business. She believes that her sales have increased with the new inventory since she stocked the business with the help of the previous loan.

loans.use: to purchase seafood, juice, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Gina Matilde

texts.es:
Gina es una mujer que le gusta mucho progresar no importa los sacrificios que tenga que hacer con tal de salir adelante, ya que ella nos comenta que sin sacrificio no se consigue nada, ella vive en la ciudad de Camaná, Perú, Camaná tienen unas hermosas playas ya que solo mirarlas uno se enamoraría  y les gustaría vivir allí; como el Perú es muy conocido por su exquisita gastronomía y uno de los platillos que más le gusta a Gina son los riquísimos “pallares “, cuando Gina tiene un tiempito libre lo disfruta mirando películas, debido a los pocos recursos económicos Gina solo pudo estudiar hasta el cuarto año de secundaria.; es madre de una señorita de 22 años de edad la cual es su orgullo y su razón de vivir cada día.

Gina se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y artículos de primera necesidad, ella trabaja alrededor de 12 horas, ya que desde muy temprano abre su bodega para poder ofrecer sus productos, puede atender hasta 40 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va muy bien en su negocio porque ofrece productos de buena calidad y sobre todo por la variedad de sus productos.

Gina agradece mucho a los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio, con esta mejora podrá ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes y aumentaran sus ingresos, con ello podrá seguir ahorrando para cumplir su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hija”
texts.en:
Gina is a women who likes to advance, it does not matter the sacrifices she has to make in order to come out ahead.  She tells us that without sacrifice nothing is achieved.  She lives in the city of Camaná, Perú.  Camaná has some beautiful beaches since at first sight one falls in love and they would like to live there.  Perú is well know for its exquisite gastronomy and one of her favorite dishes are the super delicious 'pallares'.  When she has free time, she enjoys it watching movies.  Due to her limited economic resources, she was only able to study until the fourth year of high school.  She is the mother of a 22 year old lady who is her joy and her reason to live everyday.
Gina sells groceries and other necessities.  She works about 12 hours, since she opens her store very early to be able to offer her products.  She serves up to 40 customers everyday.  She believes that she is doing very well in her business because she offers high quality products and above all because of the variety of her products.
Gina is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to their support she will be able to buy more groceries for her business.  With it she will be able to offer a greater variety of products to her customers and increase her income.  With the increased income she will be able to keep saving to achieve her great dream, "to give her daughter a profession."

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Mirella Yvone

texts.es:
Mirella es una mujer muy trabajadora, tiene 31 años de edad y vive ne la ciudad de chincha, ciudad caracterizada por ser la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano y sobre todo por su clima cálido y por la sazón de sus pobladores para la preparación de las comidas, por ello uno de los platos favoritos de Mirella es la riquísima “Carapulcra”, Mirella estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Derecho.

Mirella trabaja en su negocio de venta de comida, se levanta muy temprano para comprar los insumos para la preparación de sus platillo ya que ella nos dice que cuando los ingredientes son frescos la comida sale aun mas rica, en un dia puede atender hasta 140 clientes y es que ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque su sazon es inigualable.

Mirella está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá comprar más insumos al por mayor y con ello los productos le saldrían mucho más baratos, con esta mejora podra tener mayores ingresos y poder en algunos meses comparase un carrito sandwichero y mas adelante poder tener el dinero suficiente para cumplir su mas grande sueño: “Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Mirella is a very hard-working woman.  She is 31 years old and was born in the city of Chincha.  This city is well known for being the birthplace of many big names in Peruvian sports.  It is also known for its warm weather and the seasoning that the locals give to their food.  One of Mirella's favorite dishes is the delicious 'Carapulcra'.  Mirella studied up to the fifth year of her secondary education but she would have liked to have studied Law. 

Mirella works in her food business.  She gets up very early to buy the supplies that she needs to make her dishes.  She says that when the ingredients are fresh, the food turns out even more delicious.  In one day she can serve up to 140 customers.  She believes that her business is doing well because the flavor of her food is unbeatable.

Mirella is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their support, she will be able to buy more supplies wholesale, which will make things a lot cheaper.  This improvement will make her more income and, in a few months, she will be able to buy a sandwich cart.  In the future, she will have enough money to make her biggest dream come true: "to own my own home".

loans.use: to buy supplies for making food

loans.name: Nueva Luna Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NUEVA LUNA” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Germán Busch, está compuesta por siete integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Virginia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de carne, venta de faldas, carnicería, venta de carne de cordero, venta de fruta.

La señora Virginia,  indica que hace un año y medio que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de costura de enaguas que viene trabajando hace años.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de tela) que comprará de La Paz  y posteriormente a la elaboración lo venderá en las ferias y otros departamentos. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación.
texts.en:
The “NUEVA LUNA” community bank are about to start their second loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Germán Busch regional office.  The bank has seven members and is run by a board of directors led by Virginia.  The businesses that the members of the bank are engaged in are varied and include: meat sales, skirts sales, running a butcher's shop, veal sales and fruit sales.

Virginia tells us that she has been working with Pro Mujer for one and a half years and that she joined the institution through an invitation from a friend.  She has a business sewing traditional skirts which she has had for years.

The loan that Virginia is taking out will be used to increase her working capital.  She will buy material in La Paz, use it in her work, and then sell her end products in street markets and other departments.  This work will allow her to make income with which to support her family.  Virginia lives with her partner and has two children.

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, Virginia replied that she likes the training sessions.

loans.use: to buy material

loans.name: Mujeres Cumbeñas (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Mujeres Cumbeñas está formado por 8 mujeres luchadoras y muy trabajadoras, laboran diariamente en diferentes actividades económicas las que les permiten aportar a la economía de sus hogares. Viven por los alrededores de la parroquia de Cumbe en Cuenca, en esta parroquia hay grandes fincas ganaderas, hermosas haciendas viejas y modernas construcciones que le dan variedad al paisaje. Su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales, a la agricultura y muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo varias actividades económicas. Mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, manteniendo también su variada y rica gastronomía. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señorita. María Isabel, tiene 34 años de edad, es soltera y vive con su mamá quien se dedica a la cría de animales, la casa en la que vive es propiedad de su mamá.

La Señorita. María Isabel trabaja hace 3 años limpiando casas y oficinas, trabaja de lunes a viernes todo el día.
 
Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por su hermana, su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de joyas y cosméticos para iniciar con la venta de estos productos.
 
Su meta es construir su casa propia. 

Los niños de la foto son hijos de dos socias.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Cumbeñas communal bank is made up of 8 tenacious and hardworking women.  The members work in different economic activities that allow them to contribute to their household income.  They live around the parish of Cumbe in Cuenca—the parish has large cattle ranches, beautiful old estates, and modern buildings that bring some variety to the landscape.  The residents of Cumbe make a living from trade, raising livestock, and farming, while many work in the city and are engaged in various economic activities there.  The people maintain their culture and traditions, along with their rich and varied cuisine.

One of the members of the group is María Isabel.  She is 34 years old, single, and lives with her mother, who makes a living raising livestock and owns the house that they live in.

For 3 years María Isabel has worked cleaning homes and offices for a living.  She works all day from Monday to Friday.

This is María Isabel’s first loan with the communal bank, which her sister invited her to join.  She is going to use the loan to purchase jewellery and cosmetics so she can begin selling those items.

Her goal is to build her own home.

The children who appear in the photo are the children of two of the members.

loans.use: to purchase jewellery and cosmetics.

loans.name: Blanca Nieves Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “BLANCA NIEVES” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal de Santiago II, está compuesta por once integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Tomasa. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: tejidos en variedad, venta de chicharrones, venta de golosinas, transporte público, confección de pantalones, tejido de chompas, venta de ganado, venta de perfumes, venta de billeteras, venta de pasteles.

La señora Tomasa,  indica que es la primera vez que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de su cuñado. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejidos que viene trabajando hace algún tiempo.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de lanas) que adquirirá de la Ceja, por mayor, y posteriormente a la elaboración comercializará en puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación.

En la fotografía no aparece la señora Yhovana ya que se encontraba en consulta médica.
texts.en:
The “BLANCA NIEVES” Communal Bank will initiate its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of its Santiago II central office. It is composed of eleven members under a board of directors led by Sra. Tomasa. The businesses of the bank’s members are varied: among them we have a variety of woven goods, the sale of  chicharrónes (pork rinds), the sale of sweets, public transportation, pants making, knitted sweaters, cattle sales, perfume sales, wallet sales and pastry sales.

Sra. Tomasa notes that this is her first time working with Pro Mujer and that she joined the institution at the invitation of her brother-in-law. Currently she has a knitted goods business that she has been working at for some time.

The loan she is requesting is to expand her capital to buy wool which she will acquire wholesale from La Ceja and later knit and sell at her sales stall. This kind of work enables her to generate earnings to support her family since she lives with her partner and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she enjoys the training.

In the photo Sra. Yhovana is missing because she had to see a doctor.

loans.use: to purchase wool.

loans.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maritza, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo era la compra de mercadería agregando más rubros al negocio como son plásticos, focos, carteras, para diversificar el negocio y ofrecer al cliente mayor mercadería, la intención de ella es que sus clientes puedan encontrar varias clases de productos para generar más ventas.
Ella considera que estos préstamos le han ayudado a superarse tanto ella como su familia, adquiriendo mayor experiencia y obteniendo mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Maritza has decided to apply for a new loan. It was the purchase of merchandise adding more items to the business like plastics, light bulbs, and wallets to diversify the business and offer a greater merchandise to her customers. Her intention is to have her customer find several types of products in order to generate more sales.

She considers these loans to have helped her better herself and her family, acquiring more experience and obtaining greater earnings.

loans.use: to buy plastics, light bulbs, and wallets.

loans.name: Adriana Natividad

texts.es: Adriana Natividad emprendió su propio negocio que es una pulpería que la tiene ubicada en su casa de habitación, sus clientes la mayoría son vecinos de la comunidad donde habita. Nos cuenta Adriana que su negocio lo tiene bien surtido ya que la administración que lleva con el negocio es buena, y además que  sus clientes les ofrece variedad de producto. Ella está solicitando nuevamente financiamiento para invertir en el negocio en la compra de productos para la pulpería.Siguie con su sueño de  mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Adriana Natividad started her own business, which is a small store, in her home. The majority of her customers are neighbors from her community. Adriana notes that her business is always well stocked since she is a good manager and offers her customers a variety of products. She is requesting new funding in order to invest in her business by buying more items for the store. She also continues dreaming of making home improvements

loans.use: to purchase products for her store.
